story:
Para español , desplácese hacia abajo!

Who we are:

We are a collective, and a chosen family, committed to living cooperatively, and exploring ways to do that against the pressures of individualism, capitalism, racism, patriarchy, heterosexism, and all forms of oppression. As we build and grow this collective we invite the support of each of our communities to contribute to a vision of shared economics, sustainable living, collective healing, learning and land ownership in New York City.

Why donate?

We are raising money to provide our sister and brother with the birthing experience of their dreams. 

This baby will bring new life, energy, and love into our family, community, and movements. It is important that she is brought into the world in a way that manifests the world we want to live in: affordable health care, paid maternity and paternity leave, accessible and healthy food, caring about people over profit, ability to be in the present moment without pharmaceutical drugs that alter experience, trusting women's bodies and the traditions of our ancestors, and an abundance of love.

How will the money be used? 

The money will be used to help cover costs such as:

- natural birthing experience Maria and Karlos are planning (birthing center, prenatal yoga, doctors appointments, etc),

-costs of living so Maria can maximize her time on maternity leave

-supplies for the baby when she comes, and healthy food to support the wellness of Maria and Karlos.

Are there other ways I can contribute?

Yes! If you are unable to send money, or want to contribute in additional ways, you can! 

Gently used baby items. Email rfstahl@gmail.com if you would like the address to send Maria and Karlos any used baby items.

Check out the registry: http://www.amazon.com/gp/baby-reg/ref=cm_sw_em_...

Help make connections to pregnancy and new parent support in Oakland. If you know any pregnant women or new parents in the Oakland area, let us know! 

********************************************************************

Quien Somos

Somos colectiva, familia elegida, comprometid@s a vivir de forma cooperativa, y explorar maneras de hacer eso contra las presiones de individualismo, capitalismo, racismo, patriarcado , heterosexismo, y todas las formas de opresión. A medida que construimos y cultivamos este colectiva invitamos al apoyo de cada miembro de nuestra comunidad para contribuir a una visión de la economía compartidos, vida sostenible, la curación colectiva, el aprendizaje y propiedad comunitaria en la ciudad de Nueva York.

Porque Donar?

Estamos recaudando dinero para proveer a nuestra hermana y hermano con la experiencia del parto de sus sueños.Esta bebé traerá nueva vida, energía y amor en nuestra familia, comunidad y movimientos por justicia. Es importante que venga hacia la madre tierrea de una manera que manifiesta el mundo en que queremos vivir: atención de salud asequible, tiempo de maternidad y paternidad, aceso a comida sana, el cuidado de la gente sobre el dolar, la capacidad de estar en el presente momento sin fármacos que alteran la experiencia, confianza en los cuerpos de las mujeres y de las tradiciones de nuestros antepasados, y una abundancia de amor.

¿Hay otras maneras de contribuir ?

¡Sí! Si usted es incapaz de enviar dinero, o quiere contribuir de manera adicional, se puede!

Se necesita artículos de bebé. Se prefieren usados. Mandele un email arfstahl@gmail.com si desea la dirección para enviarle a María y Karlos algún artículo.

Si necesitas ideas de lo que le hace falta, visite a el registro: http : //www.amazon.com/gp/baby-reg/ref=cm_sw_em _...

Ayude a hacer conexiones con mujeres embarazada o nuevos padres en el área de Oakland.  Si conoces a una mujer embarazada, que recian dio aluz o que tengan nin@s, háganoslo saber!

story:
Only 30 Days to Reach Our Goal...

Please Help Us Raise $40K

Tell me more...

The Wave Float Room monitors and controls the air and water temperature inside the room. Your float experience will be in a beautiful, private 4.5’ x 8’ float room filled with 10" of water saturated with 1,000 lbs of Epsom salt. The solution temperature is consistent at skin temperature 93.5 degrees. The white interior is complimented by the unique contour ceiling and accompanied by client-controlled LED, underwater color light therapy, a music system and intercom. This tranquil haven creates an environment where you’re invited to relax and let go. Separating your mind from your body will open the experience to meditate, develop the mind and evolve one’s thinking. Repeat floating will also expand your heart, unlock creativity and contemplate the bigger global world.

Continuing a 60+ year practice...

The practice of float therapy was established in the 1950’s as a method of research to study conscious activity in the brain without any external stimuli. The practice of float therapy is also known as "Restricted Environmental Stimulation Therapy". Tranquil Waters Float firmly believes that everyone should be able to enjoy the many physical and mental benefits of the practice of floatation. This unique oasis provides noticeable benefits from R.E.S.T., whether they be physical, mental or emotional. As the participant, you will float effortlessly without gravity. Your mind will become disconnected from the body. By releasing tension, many leave the tank feeling rejuvenated with increased energy and easier, fuller breathing. Learn more about the float experience from the video above narrated by Joe Rogan.

Floating benefits promote the following:

  • Inner peace and release of tension
  • Energy, Vitality and Endorphins
  • Combats insomnia and improves sleep quality
  • Enhances creativity and problem solving
  • Stimulates left/right brain synchronization
  • Deepens meditation and consciousness
  • Recovery from stress, anxiety and fear
  • Accelerates healing process from injuries
  • Improves athletic performance
  • Lowers cortisol levels
  • Relieve inflammation
  • Lowers blood pressure
  • Replenish magnesium
  • Relieves chronic pain due to arthritis, fibromyalgia, migraines, and injuries
  • Boosts immune system
  • Improves circulation and distribution of oxygen and nutrients
  • Quickens recovery from jet lag, shift work and fatigue

Getting to know us better…

Owners John and Maria are very passionate that they’re building a floatation therapy center right here in Edison Park! John’s roots have been firmly grounded in Chicago. For over 35 years as an electrical mechanic. And while participating in triathlon’s in the late 80’s, Floating came into John’s life as an amazing way to heal his body and mind.

“I truly believe that world peace is possible and that floatation therapy can be one of the tools to make it happen.”

He then introduced floating to Maria. At that time, she was working at a stressful fast paced corporate travel agency.

“I used floating to clear my mind from my work. Even though it was a one hour float, it help me be more relax and focus.”

We passionately feel humans need to tap into mindfulness which directly relates to peacefulness and serenity. And floatation therapy we have found to be the easiest way to do this. Who doesn’t like easy :)

But we need you...

Tranquil Waters Float is very excited to give this gift of serenity to our community. However, float tanks are an expensive investment. Our oasis has four wave float rooms, two hydro massage tables, and a relaxation area in the lobby accompanied by a mesmerizing saltwater aquarium.

We encourage you to hang out with us before or after your float among the Himalayan salt crystals, aromatherapy, beautiful stained glass and other art mediums. Savor a cup of herbal tea with us!

Unique to Tranquil Waters Float is our courtesy transportation at Edison Park Metro Station and the Harlem CTA Blue Line Stop when a minimum two floaters are scheduled at the same time. Please schedule at least 48 hours in advance.

There are several ways you can help us out…

Packages:

Browse our special pre-opening packages on the right side of the page and take advantage of these GREAT prices! All IndieGoGo backers will get first access to Tranquil Waters Float SOFT OPENING on November 2nd, 2016. You will have priority scheduling and early access prior to our GRAND OPENING on November 19th, 2016.

Outreach:

Unable to donate? We’d appreciate your help spreading the word and sharing our campaign on social media.

Questions?

Feel free to call us @ (844) - TWFLOAT | (844) 893-5628

Repeat floating will also expand your heart, unlock creativity and contemplate the bigger global world.Continuing a 60+ year practice...The practice of float therapy was established in the 1950’s as a method of research to study conscious activity in the brain without any external stimuli. The practice of float therapy is also known as "Restricted Environmental Stimulation Therapy". Tranquil Waters Float firmly believes that everyone should be able to enjoy the many physical and mental benefits of the practice of floatation. This unique oasis provides noticeable benefits from R.E.S.T., whether they be physical, mental or emotional. As the participant, you will float effortlessly without gravity. Your mind will become disconnected from the body. By releasing tension, many leave the tank feeling rejuvenated with increased energy and easier, fuller breathing. Learn more about the float experience from the video above narrated by Joe Rogan.Floating benefits promote the following:
Inner peace and release of tension
Energy, Vitality and Endorphins
Combats insomnia and improves sleep quality
Enhances creativity and problem solving
Stimulates left/right brain synchronization
Deepens meditation and consciousness
Recovery from stress, anxiety and fear
Accelerates healing process from injuries
Improves athletic performance
Lowers cortisol levels
Relieve inflammation
Lowers blood pressure
Replenish magnesium
Relieves chronic pain due to arthritis, fibromyalgia, migraines, and injuries
Boosts immune system
Improves circulation and distribution of oxygen and nutrients
Quickens recovery from jet lag, shift work and fatigue
Getting to know us better…Owners John and Maria are very passionate that they’re building a floatation therapy center right here in Edison Park! John’s roots have been firmly grounded in Chicago. For over 35 years as an electrical mechanic. And while participating in triathlon’s in the late 80’s, Floating came into John’s life as an amazing way to heal his body and mind.“I truly believe that world peace is possible and that floatation therapy can be one of the tools to make it happen.”He then introduced floating to Maria. At that time, she was working at a stressful fast paced corporate travel agency.“I used floating to clear my mind from my work. Even though it was a one hour float, it help me be more relax and focus.”We passionately feel humans need to tap into mindfulness which directly relates to peacefulness and serenity. And floatation therapy we have found to be the easiest way to do this. Who doesn’t like easy :)But we need you...Tranquil Waters Float is very excited to give this gift of serenity to our community. However, float tanks are an expensive investment. Our oasis has four wave float rooms, two hydro massage tables, and a relaxation area in the lobby accompanied by a mesmerizing saltwater aquarium.We encourage you to hang out with us before or after your float among the Himalayan salt crystals, aromatherapy, beautiful stained glass and other art mediums. Savor a cup of herbal tea with us!Unique to Tranquil Waters Float is our courtesy transportation at Edison Park Metro Station and the Harlem CTA Blue Line Stop when a minimum two floaters are scheduled at the same time. Please schedule at least 48 hours in advance.There are several ways you can help us out…Packages:Browse our special pre-opening packages on the right side of the page and take advantage of these GREAT prices! All IndieGoGo backers will get first access to Tranquil Waters Float SOFT OPENING on November 2nd, 2016. You will have priority scheduling and early access prior to our GRAND OPENING on November 19th, 2016.Outreach:Unable to donate? We’d appreciate your help spreading the word and sharing our campaign on social media.Questions?Feel free to call us @ (844) - TWFLOAT | (844) 893-5628

story:
"Lick This" will be a indoor  sensory play place and cupcake cafe geared towards special needs children and their families. The name comes from my son's endearing quality of licking everything and that we will have a cupcakery.   Parents of special needs children get stared at and judged doing the simplest things, like going to the park or grocery shopping.  "Lick This"  will provide a safe place for these families where the kids can play and the parents can sit back with some coffee and snacks  knowing the person next to them has been there, done that. There are no indoor play places in our area, let alone one for special needs children.  We are in a military town so naturally there are a lot of children with not much to do.  Although "Lick This" will be geared towards special needs children, all are welcome.


Donations will be used to renovate the space and purchase Eco-friendly play equipment that is sensory friendly. 


Why are we doing this?  I am a mother of four amazing children.  Our four year old has always been a little different. It was dismissed by doctors for a very long time. When he was two, he had two grand mal seizures within 24 hours. After fighting with his PCM and our insurance company we were able to take Connor to a neurologist and months later, found that he had Chiari I Malformation.  On top of his Chiari, we later came to find that Connor is also Autistic. My husband is a US Marine so where we live, there are tons of families, many have children that are special needs.  I've spent the past two years spending much of my time at Connor's OT and Speech appointments and have seen kids just like Connor and parents just like us, come in and out.  We all need a place that we can come to, knowing that there will be no one staring at our differences, no one making comments about our child.  Where we can sit and chat with someone who has been there done that, or sit silently and watch our child play with pride.

story:
(English description below)

Court résumé du projet 

Qui sommes-nous ?

AFG Québec (Association des firmes de génie-conseil du Québec). Nous sommes un regroupement bénévole issu de l’industrie du génie-conseil au Québec. À l’intérieur de l’AFG il y a le Forum des Jeunes Professionnels et c’est nous, dans le cadre de l’évènement "Je vois MTL" maintenant devenu "Je fais MTL", qui nous sommes engagés à réaliser le projet du Parallèle 40, une initiative communautaire contribuant à doter Montréal d’infrastructures à l’image de ses citoyens.  

Pourquoi des jeunes ingénieurs ?

Pourquoi pas? Comme bien des professionnels nous voulons nous impliquer dans notre communauté et essayer de faire une différence en-dehors de notre cadre professionnel. Nous voulons mettre en pratique notre expertise et nos talent de gestion de projet, d'autant plus qu'il s'agit d'ouvrages issus de notre milieu. Qui plus est, ce projet nous permettra de sortir de nos tâches classiques et de travailler avec la communauté.   

Et qu’est-ce que vous proposez ?

Nous vous proposons le projet du Parallèle 40! Nous voulons peinturer, embellir et bien plus! Grace à l’autorisation du Ministère des Transports et des arrondissements voisins, nous voulons réaménager le dessous de l’autoroute 40.  En débutant par l’intersection Henri-Julien et Crémazie, dès cet été, nous voulons commencer par embellir le passage sous l’autoroute 40 en y peinturant, à l’aide de pochoirs, des designs rappelant aux citoyens que cet espace peut être accueillant. Ce projet se fera en équipe avec des professionnels, des artistes, des éco-quartiers et des jeunes provenant du centre l'Escale ainsi que d'autre équipes de jeunes provenant des organismes C-Vert et Trajet. Un des objectifs du Parallèle 40 est de favoriser les rapprochements entre les jeunes et les professionnels et de partager l’intérêt face à l’implication communautaire. Ce projet sert de catalyseur afin de motiver les citoyens et les arrondissements dans le but de rendre le dessous de l’autoroute 40 un endroit invitant et qui sait, un jour, un incontournable de la vie urbaine de Montréal.

Ce dont nous avons de besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Le dessous de l’autoroute 40 c’est moche, et qu’est-ce qu’il nous faut pour arranger ça ?

De la peinture et c’est presque tout. Nous voulons peinturer les colonnes de béton existantes. Pour réaliser cette tâche, il faut bien entendu une peinture de qualité qui ne se détériorera pas. Il faut aussi du balisage et de l’entreposage puisque nous travaillons sur le site du Ministère des Transports. Et de plus, il faut prévoir tous les coûts associés à la sécurité de l’équipe de 45 bénévoles, artistes, jeunes et divers professionnels, qui travailleront avec nous pour peindre les colonnes.

De combien avons-nous besoin?

L’objectif initial du Parallèle 40 est de 5 000$, ce qui serait suffisant pour peinturer 18 colonnes à partir de l’axe Henri-Julien, fournir des contreparties et louer des équipements. On arrive à établir un coût par colonne, ce qui veut dire que si nous dépassons notre objectif, nous pouvons peinturer davantage de colonnes.

Qu’est-ce que vous en retirez ?

Une nouvelle aire plus conviviale pour circuler en dessous de l’autoroute 40. Un endroit où prendre une pause ou flâner un peu. Et surtout, un potentiel d’expansion de la vie urbaine sous l’autoroute 40.

L’impact

Parallèle 40 est une initiative qui souhaite provoquer une réaction qui valorisera le secteur. Il est dans notre souhait de réitérer le projet à chaque année et de le rendre suffisamment important pour qu’il nous permettre de réaménager une grande portion sous l’autoroute 40. Le but ultime est de faire du Parallèle 40 un parc urbain vivant dans le même genre d’initiative que le projet d'aménagement urbain "HighLine" de New York. 

Risques et défis

Nos enjeux sont presque tous résolus grâce à l’appui des représentants publics et des arrondissements. Le seul défi restant pourra être résolu grâce à vos dons puisque aucuns fonds publics ou privés ne sont présentement attribués pour faire le projet. La portée du projet sera donc proportionnelle aux dons obtenus.

Autres façons d'aider

Vous n’est pas en mesure de nous aider en faisant un don mais vous souhaitez nous aider? Aucun problème. Si vous voulez vous impliquer pour les murales ou si vous souhaitez peinturer vous-même avec nous cet été, vous êtes les bienvenus.

Short Summary

Who are we?

The AFG, Association of Consulting Engineers of Quebec. We are a voluntary organization emerging from the consulting engineering industry. Inside AFG there is the Young Professionals Forum and it is us, as part of the movement "I see MTL" who has now become "Je fais MTL", who are committed to the “Parallele40” Project, which  will help provide Montreal with infrastructures that its communities will enjoy and pride themselves with.

Why young engineers?

Why not? Like many professionals,  we want to get involved in our community and try to make a difference outside of our day-to-day professional practice. We want to apply our expertise and project management skills, espacially since these works come from our field.  Also, this project will take us out of our traditional tasks and will get us to build something meaningful with the community which benefits from it. 

And what do we offer?

We offer you the “Parallele40” Project: We want to paint, embellish and much more! With the support of the of Ministry of Transport and neighboring boroughs, we want to redevelop the space under the Highway 40. Starting with the intersection of Henri-Julien and Crémazie this summer, we want to start by beautifying the passage under Highway 40 by painting columns with stencil designs to remind citizens that this space can be warm and welcoming. This project will team up professionals, artists and Teens from l'Escale center and other groups of young volunteers from C-Vert and Trajet. One of the goals of the "Parallele40" is to develop and strengthen the bond between youth and professionals, as well as to promote the benefit of community involvement and citizen-driven initiatives. This project serves as a catalyst to motivate citizens and districts in order to make the space under the Highway 40 an inviting place… And,  who knows, one day, a staple of the urban life of Montreal.

What We Need & What You Get

The space under the Highway 40 is ugly and uninviting, but what do we need to fix it?

Paint, and that’s mostly it. We want to paint the existing concrete columns. To perform this task we need quality paint that will not deteriorate. We also need signaling and storage since we will be working on a site of the Ministry of Transport. And again, there must be all the costs associated with the safety of the team of 45 volunteers, participants, artists and engineers, who will work with us to paint the columns.

And how much do we need?

The project is scalable.  The first step will require $ 5,000. It would be enough to paint 18 columns. starting from the Henri-Julien axis, offer perks and equipment renting. We managed to establish a cost per column, which means that any extra money raised involves more columns to be painted and a bigger scale of the project. 

What’s in it for you?

A new user-friendly area for pedestrians underneath the Highway 40. A place to take a coffee break or stroll. And above all, the possibility for expansion of urban life under the Highway 40.

Impact

"Parallele40" is an initiative that wants to trigger a reaction that will rejuvenate the area. It is our desire to repeat the project every year and make it important enough to allow us to redevelop a large portion underneath the Highway 40. The ultimate goal will be to make of the "Parallele40" a lively urban park in the same vein as the "HighLine" of New York. 

Risks & Challenges

Most of the challenges we originally faced have been overcome with the support of public officials and the boroughs. The only remaining challenge we must solve is funding through private means, as there are no public funding attributed to this project, since it’s been initiated and organized by citizens. The project scope will be proportional to the donations obtained.

Other Ways You Can Help

You are not able to help us with a donation but you want to help us?  No problem. If you want to get involved for the wall art or if you want to paint with us this summer you will be warmly welcomed.

story: Super Troopers is not only a great film...it is the GREATEST film. That is until Super Troopers 2 comes out next year. With our (read: your) money we can secure a spot in their first ever Beerfest tournament in Chicago. We are willing to call in sick from work and fly across the country because this is truly our calling. Your money shall not go to waste as we WILL win this thing; it's in our blood, just ask our BAC. Really anything you guys could help us out with would be much appreciated and everything that doesn't go to our flight goes directly into making their movie! So really it's a win win situation!!! Let's do this!!

story:
As a native of Lima Peru I am passionate about sharing the traditional taste of fine Peruvian food and its unique culture with others. My cart will specialize in classic Peruvian seafood dishes in combination with original fusion dishes of my own. The beauty of being an establishment on wheels means that I will be able to operate in different locations, catering out of my food cart for different events and various venues on the weekends as well as staying local for day to day business.

What sets my cart apart from others, superb food aside, is my plan to host a monthly event. My hope is to collaborate with local artists, entrepreneurs and businesses in which Kichana provides a free meal and a fun learning experience for kids. Art, cooking, yoga, gardening, ecology are some of the topics I hope to cover. I believe Kichana’s monthly classes will bring individuals together, open conversation, and create strong relationships.  Building community capacity in the Kichana neighborhood and beyond.

story:
IT'S A SAD TRUTH: 99% Of Ordinary Grill Brushes Completely Suck In One Or More Ways...

Regular grill brushes suffer from some combination of three unforgivable qualities....

#1 - They either shed dangerous metal bristles
#2 - Are completely worthless at their primary function of cleaning the grill
#3 - Or they break down and get tossed away after a couple uses

See your brush in here anywhere?

INTRODUCING GRILLINATOR: The first brush to squash all three unforgivable qualities with absolute authority. Here's how we do it...

 

 

Here at Grillinator, we source and sell high quality BBQ grilling accessories. Grill brushes are the #1 product in the category, so it only makes sense we need a grill brush to be a part of our product line. 

Unfortunately upon due diligence in the summer of 2014, we realized there is a major liability aspect to selling grill brushes due to the risk of bristles coming loose, getting stuck in your food and moving on to your stomach. We didn't want any part of that.

Going beyond the safety aspect, we're also committed to selling products that don't suck. Unfortunately, every ounce of our combined grilling expertise told us that every grill brush sucks in one way or another. Just to be sure, we purchased and tested every brush on the market... and yep, they all had at least one major flaw. Here is what we found...

METAL HAIR PLUG BRISTLES 

Pros: The good ones clean decently well.
Cons: Testing showed highest risk of bristle balding.
Conclusion: We're branded as the Grillin' & Chillin' boys and since there isn't much chillin' to be had in the ER, we crossed these off our list.

METAL SPINDLE BOUND BRISTLES: 

Pros: Bristles are virtually impossible to yank out with high quality brands.
Cons: Cleans in-between your grill grate, or on top... but not both.
Conclusion: Buy quality brands in both styles to get the job done safely.

NYLON HAIR PLUG BRISTLES: 

Pros: Hard to miss these bristles even if they do fall out.
Cons: Just doesn't get the job done.
Conclusion: If you need a brush to clean dishes, this is perfect.

Wood & Metal Scrapers:

Pros: Cleans top of your grill grate really well.
Cons: Doesn't clean in-between grill grate at all.
Conclusion: Must be combined with another brush to get the job done.

A Long Story Short...

The only way we found to safely & effectively clean a grill with current off the shelf products is to buy multiple styles of grill brushes which is both expensive and time consuming. We really wanted to find a grill brush to sell, but just couldn't find anything worthy of the Grillinator name, so we decided to build one from scratch.

Almost exactly a year ago, 3/26/15 to be exact, we ponied up a large R&D fee and got the process started. Since that time, we've gone through more than a half dozen prototypes. We've also made a few more R&D payments than we expected. It's all been worth it. We have a product we're proud of that outperforms anything on the market. 

With your help in backing our campaign, we can turn our final prototype into a mass production reality. We're confident the Grillinator will be the last BBQ grill brush you'll ever own.

We are friends. We are family. We are business partners. We LOVE to grill and we LOVE to chill. We’ve known each other for years and have been working together as long. Our passion for some great BBQ, fun times and family brought us together and spawned the development of the Grillinator Brand of BBQ Tools, Gadgets and Products that you can only get from The Boys at Grillin’ and Chillin’.

We’ve been working together on this project for more than a year from across many miles and are so excited to see the creation of the Grillinator Grill brush become a reality and help take the BBQ experience to the next level.

Shawn holds down the fort in Missouri. Damien is the true blue Texan born and bred and Brad is from Michigan but got to Texas as fast as he could. We’re here to have fun, share our passion with the world and offer people first class products and an unmatched customer experience.

We are so thrilled you stopped by to check us out and we can't wait to have you on board!!!
story_txt:
IT'S A SAD TRUTH: 99% Of Ordinary Grill Brushes Completely Suck In One Or More Ways...
Regular grill brushes suffer from some combination of three unforgivable qualities....
#1 - They either shed dangerous metal bristles#2 - Are completely worthless at their primary function of cleaning the grill#3 - Or they break down and get tossed away after a couple uses

See your brush in here anywhere?
INTRODUCING GRILLINATOR: The first brush to squash all three unforgivable qualities with absolute authority. Here's how we do it...




 




 

Here at Grillinator, we source and sell high quality BBQ grilling accessories. Grill brushes are the #1 product in the category, so it only makes sense we need a grill brush to be a part of our product line. 
Unfortunately upon due diligence in the summer of 2014, we realized there is a major liability aspect to selling grill brushes due to the risk of bristles coming loose, getting stuck in your food and moving on to your stomach. We didn't want any part of that.
Going beyond the safety aspect, we're also committed to selling products that don't suck. Unfortunately, every ounce of our combined grilling expertise told us that every grill brush sucks in one way or another. Just to be sure, we purchased and tested every brush on the market... and yep, they all had at least one major flaw. Here is what we found...
METAL HAIR PLUG BRISTLES 
Pros: The good ones clean decently well.Cons: Testing showed highest risk of bristle balding.Conclusion: We're branded as the Grillin' & Chillin' boys and since there isn't much chillin' to be had in the ER, we crossed these off our list.

METAL SPINDLE BOUND BRISTLES: 
Pros: Bristles are virtually impossible to yank out with high quality brands.Cons: Cleans in-between your grill grate, or on top... but not both.Conclusion: Buy quality brands in both styles to get the job done safely.

NYLON HAIR PLUG BRISTLES: 
Pros: Hard to miss these bristles even if they do fall out.Cons: Just doesn't get the job done.Conclusion: If you need a brush to clean dishes, this is perfect.

Wood & Metal Scrapers:
Pros: Cleans top of your grill grate really well.Cons: Doesn't clean in-between grill grate at all.Conclusion: Must be combined with another brush to get the job done.

A Long Story Short...
The only way we found to safely & effectively clean a grill with current off the shelf products is to buy multiple styles of grill brushes which is both expensive and time consuming. We really wanted to find a grill brush to sell, but just couldn't find anything worthy of the Grillinator name, so we decided to build one from scratch.
Almost exactly a year ago, 3/26/15 to be exact, we ponied up a large R&D fee and got the process started. Since that time, we've gone through more than a half dozen prototypes. We've also made a few more R&D payments than we expected. It's all been worth it. We have a product we're proud of that outperforms anything on the market. 
With your help in backing our campaign, we can turn our final prototype into a mass production reality. We're confident the Grillinator will be the last BBQ grill brush you'll ever own.


We are friends. We are family. We are business partners. We LOVE to grill and we LOVE to chill. We’ve known each other for years and have been working together as long. Our passion for some great BBQ, fun times and family brought us together and spawned the development of the Grillinator Brand of BBQ Tools, Gadgets and Products that you can only get from The Boys at Grillin’ and Chillin’.
We’ve been working together on this project for more than a year from across many miles and are so excited to see the creation of the Grillinator Grill brush become a reality and help take the BBQ experience to the next level.
Shawn holds down the fort in Missouri. Damien is the true blue Texan born and bred and Brad is from Michigan but got to Texas as fast as he could. We’re here to have fun, share our passion with the world and offer people first class products and an unmatched customer experience.
We are so thrilled you stopped by to check us out and we can't wait to have you on board!!!

story:
Bali deals online

I came to Bali 3 months ago. First impression - so many tours and transport providers, so many amazing coffee shops, restaurants and other places to go, but I don't know who to trust and what to pick! So I checked TripAdvisor and chose the most recommended places in Bali. Oh dear, that was my mistake.. I overpaid a lot and felt like I'm back to Europe. 

The issues I noticed while being here:

  • Highly recommended places (or businesses located on the main streets) are monopolising the market, small companies are left in the shadow therefore they can hardly survive
  • To find all hidden gems yourself is a time consuming task
  • Haggling about the prices became a daily activity in Bali you would definitely want to avoid
  • There isn't another website in Bali offering few things you could possibly need (e.g. transport tickets, spa vouchers) at one place 

What we offer:
FIND the hidden gems 
CONNECT with traditional Balinese culture
SUPPORT the local community
SAVE without an awkward haggling
LOVE the unique experience 

What has been done so far:

  • Domain name active, website in progress 
  • Logo 
  • Team who are helping me with the website and marketing 
  • Business plan 
  • Market research 
  • Lot's of interest and support both from businesses and future customers

Problems: 

  • I need a permission and a working visa to make it legal
  • Money for marketing purposes (flyers, posters, business cards)

Note: If I won't reach the target all your donations will be returned back to you.

Make your holiday in Bali a relaxed experience by pre-booking everything you could possibly need before you come. It would be definitely a huge benefit for you and a chance for those small companies to survive!

Get one of our perks, support + share the idea, and we hope to see you in Bali!

story: The money raised from this campaign will go towards getting a physical store front for CB Books and Anime. It'll be used to purchase inventory, supplies, and bookshelves, as well as rent. Right now we sell anime giftbaskets online on our own small website and ebay; we'd love to expand that out to selling used book grab bags, anime grab bags, and anime figurines. Please help us out by sharing a link to our campaign on FB or twitter.

story:
We have the coolest space for girls in Atlanta!

Razz Dazz girls is a new concept opened by four Moms/business women Sept. 2014. The goal for Razz Dazz Girls is to provide three necessary services in one location. We are premium upscale environment for girls age 4-16 to receive salon services, parties, and education. We want to be more than just another party space. Razz Dazz Girls is really a form of "Edutainment", educating and entertaining at the same time.

-We have a full service salon that caters to all hair types and provide hair care and skincare work shops.

-We have a create your own body product area; where girls learn how to make products they love with all natural ingredients; such as lip balm, body scrub and body butter.

-We have party packages that are different such as Karaoke, Fashion runway and Garden parties

Our future aspirations are to have summer camps that inspire girls in the areas of fashion, art, DIY projects, and up cycling.

As Mompreneurs we have come together after owning other successful businesses. Our combined experiences include an inflatable play & party center for children, a full service salon for adults, a women's clothing line, accounting and a health screening awareness non-profit organization. We feel our experience along with our passion for empowering girls makes Razz Dazz Girls a unique place to be. When it comes to parties…..we just believe we can be do it better!

-We provide huge party rooms that are open and spacious.  Each party room has a beautifully decorated table and chairs with linens and real place settings.

-We have over 8,000 square feet in historical downtown Decatur, Georgia, so the entire family can stay and relax in our family area.

-Our party dress up attire does not consist of costumes, but real fashions from top children’s designers.

-Our environment is upscale and over the top family friendly.

-We have all-natural and toxic free choices for all the products that we use.

-We allow outside food and catering.

-Best of all we can customize your special birthday celebration to satisfy your daughters’ interests.

We need your help. Though we pulled our resources and opened the doors we need help to complete the vision of Razz Dazz Girls. We need a rent cushion while we market this brand new concept. We need more supplies and equipment to finish our indoor space as well as develop and outfit our outdoor garden space. Funds will also help us launch our planned summer camp. With our summer camp we wish to combine girls of different socioeconomic backgrounds by offering a percentage of the camp slots to scholarships for needy and at risk girls. The combination of girls from all backgrounds allow children to learn from each other and teach tolerance all while being creative and having fun.

story:
She is a woman, she is a mother, she works hard to provide for her family. Although she lives on less than $1.25 a day, she is dedicated to overcoming  poverty. This woman is more than a client, she is our partner in creating stronger and more resilient communities. We Believe in Her.

Will you Believe in Her? 

Despite having an entrepreneurial spirit, women in Ethiopia, like many parts of the developing world, lack economic opportunities. Their challenges include lack of access to training and credit to start or grow a small business, making it impossible to escape chronic poverty.

Seeds of Africa focuses on a two-pronged approach to overcome poverty in communities like Adama, Ethiopia.

Seeding Education offers quality education to students, in addition to school meals, uniforms, school supplies and medical support for children starting in Pre-Kindergarten. Sowing Community works with mothers and grandmothers of our students to increase their household incomes and improve their quality of life through health education seminars, adult literacy and entrepreneurship courses, and access to credit.

Since we launched our Sowing Community program, we have witnessed how a small business loan can help women in their quest to overcome poverty and make a better life for their families. It confirmed our belief that when empowered, women can and will succeed. Today, more than 95% of participants have successfully repaid their loans in full. With your support, we can expand this program to serve 25 additional mothers of our newly enrolled students.

Join us and give the gift of opportunity.

Why give to Believe in Her?

  • Given over 95% of our loans are paid on time and in full, there is more opportunity than risk in lending to women.
  • Investing in families as a unit is the key to overcoming poverty.
  • Your contribution will be added to a revolving fund that supports a local business such as a small farm. Once that loan is repaid, it can fund another restaurant, convenience store, hair salon, or bakery.

She is one of many 


"There is a huge difference in my life. I can support my family in a sustainable way."
Chaltu | Grandmother of 4th grader Biniyam | Number of loans: 2 | Business: dairy farmer 

Other ways to Believe in Her

  • Share the impactful stories of the women we serve via social media and email with our #BeleiveInHer hashtag. Make it a goal to share with 5 of your friends, have them share too!
  • Stay connected with us on Facebook | Instagram | Twitter

Our supporters include:

  • Alexander Soros Foundation
  • Bristol-Myers Squibb Foundation
  • Hoffman Brothers Foundation
  • Leila and Mickey Straus Family Charitable Trust
  • Mark and Diane Simmons Charitable Fund
  • The George Link Jr. Charitable Trust
  • YellowChair Foundation
  • US Fund for UNICEF
  • The Armstrong Trust
  • iF Foundation
  • GE

story:
Who We Are

We are a group of five broke college students from the University of Tennessee trying to make a difference in the lives of children with life-threatening illnesses.  Some people assume that disabled and terminally ill children are provided with the essentials they need in order to enjoy a high quality of life for as long as possible, but what about their surroundings?

We have teamed up with Special Spaces, a nonprofit organization, on the premise that these children need a place to find peace and comfort. Through volunteer efforts, support, and donations, we intend to transform the bedrooms of these special children into magical places of hope.



What We Need

Each remodel costs a total of $3,000 per bedroom.  Everything is custom made on site to the wishes and medical needs of the child and their family.  The Special Spaces crew consists of a licensed contractor, seamstress, painter and designer enabling the job to be completed within one day.  Therefore, any donation(s) of goods, services, or monetary value makes every bit of a difference.  Material donations can be found on our Wish List.


The ultimate goal of our campaign is to raise enough money to sponsor a whole room, however the funding for a makeover consists of many expensive materials necessary for the construction and remodeling of the room. From large items such as power tools, furniture, and flooring to small items including brooms, painters tape, and screw drivers, the cost can really add up.

                         


What You Get

Over the last ten years, Special Spaces has been able to create more than 400 dream bedrooms for children thanks to 35 affiliates while more affiliates are being started all over the country each year.  We promise it will be an effort you will always remember and a day that a child with a life threatening illness will never forget.

Special Spaces is a 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization. As such, financial contributions may be deductible for federal income tax purposes and verifiable by receipt.

How It Helps The Community

A bedroom to most children is a personal space that represents their unique personality.  Special Spaces evolved on the precedence that children facing life-threatening illness and compromised immune systems need a special space all to themselves.  Our focus is on providing hope and inspiration to these children. You would be lifting the spirits of the community by making the lives of these children and their families more comfortable.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are currently unable to donate and still want to help, there are several volunteer opportunities scheduled on Special Spaces website as well as posts on Special Spaces Facebook and Twitter.  Please take a look and determine if you could share your time, talents or treasures with Special Spaces.

You can also refer a child.  If there someone you feel fits the concept of our organization please contact your local branch manager by email at chris@specialspaces.org or by phone at 865-661-1833.

story:
This request goes out to any friends and family who might be interested in supporting the refugees currently in Budapest. These people are mainly from Syria and are fleeing a war torn country by way of various European countries.  Thousands have been in Budapest for weeks now, waiting to travel on to their next destination.  The living conditions are dire; sleeping on the ground outside train stations with no real hygenic facilities and not enough food.   There are many families and hundreds of children.  There are very few ways to travel onward, besides the trains which are infrequent and are often stopped at borders and emptied, or other dangerous methods which can result in death.

Local support efforts are in place, but the needs exceed what is out there.  Donations of food and basic supplies are appreciated and we are able to deliver them ourselves or get them to people that have the means to deliver them.

If you make a donation, it will go towards people purchasing apples, bananas, supplies for sandwiches, shoes, basic toiletries, mats to sleep on, and whatever else is needed.  We are simply individuals living and working in the wonderful city of Budapest who are trying to help.  Nothing fancy right now.   Just the basics.

story:
1 in every 3 women will experience some form of sexual abuse in their lifetime.

Unfortunately, there are millions of women who already meet this statistic. 


With our project F.R.E.E., we want to help Females be Redeemed, Empowered, and Elevated from the chains of sexual abuse.

 We want to do this by giving 10 sexually abused women from Carson, California free mental health counseling for 1 whole year. 

Sexual abuse doesn't discriminate based on age. We want to address this by having each of these women represent an age range, with two women from their             teens, 20's, 30's, 40's, and 50's.

This counseling is designed to help these diverse women overcome the psychological, emotional, and spiritual effects of their traumatic sexual experiences, all while free from financial burdens. 


Who are we?

We are Yeshua Ministries International:

A non-profit ministry that is devoted to providing counseling, therapy, and ministerial services to under served communities. 

                                Yeshua Ministries International was founded in 2010 by                         Pastor Mirlande Amazan, LCSW, MSW

       Pastor Mirlande Amazan has mental health counseling, therapy and social work           experience spanning over 15 years, and has been in ministry for over 23 years.                   

With a License in Clinical Social Work and a Master's in Social Work, she understands both the science and the craft of mental health therapy.

During her time in social work, Pastor Amazan has counseled sexual abuse victims of all ages, and understands the process it takes to overcome the devastating effects of sexual trauma. 
YMI's counseling & therapy covers psychological, emotional, and spiritual elements of trauma to create a holistic healing process. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yeshua Ministries International office is based in Rancho Palos Verdes. For the past 3 years, we have served the area of Carson California under a partnership with Resurrection Church LA, and here is where we found a community that was in great need of counseling. 

It is rare for communities like Carson CA to have mental health counseling. Within this community, we've found that counseling and therapy is not viewed as necessary. This is because of the steep costs of counseling.

Where does my donation go?
     Your donation goes directly to the costs it takes for counseling.

Normally, we would have to charge clients $100-150/session, and many times YMI functions on a sliding scale and even performs many pro-bono sessions. However, in order to cover our overhead costs of labor, office space, utilities, which total $1500/month, we must charge at least $100/session in order to avoid going into a deficit. 

Over the course of one year, YMI spends $18,000 to cover overhead costs, and these costs are being paid by the people we are trying to help. 

 Although our clients need counseling every week, it is far too expensive for them to come continually. Many times we see our clients discontinue the counseling that is changing their lives all because of monetary constraints.

We would like to raise money so they can continually receive help without worrying about their finances. They already have enough to worry about.

We ask for enough donations to cover a year because continual counseling leads to  exponential development in one's emotional, psychological, and spiritual health. Weekly counseling helps them grow incrementally, and their progress occurs over time. 


Why this campaign?

Sexual abuse is one of the most traumatizing forms of abuse that can occur. The pain and trauma occurs on a  chemical, emotional, psychological, and even spiritual level. Because of this, it takes extra time to reverse the effects, so blessing women who have undergone this is one of our passions. 


The more you give, the more women we can help

With your donation, you will be changing the life of 100 sexually abused women.        We started the goal of this campaign at $18,000 for 10 people, but there are many more woman that are also in need of this therapy. If we exceed our goal, we will give free counseling to as many women as possible. 

Also if we exceed our goal, we would like to make video documentaries  for all of the contributors to see. In this way, you can see the effect your donation has directly. This will only occur, however, if we meet and exceed our goal.

If we do not meet our goal, we will use what we receive to give as many women free counseling as we can.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't give, spreading the word to others is equally a blessing. Please share the link of this page with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, or any other form of social media. Even telling your friends and family about the campaign will help.


To learn more about Yeshua Ministries International, visit www.yeshuaministriesintl.org
story_txt:
1 in every 3 women will experience some form of sexual abuse in their lifetime.


Unfortunately, there are millions of women who already meet this statistic. 



With our project F.R.E.E., we want to help Females be Redeemed, Empowered, and Elevated from the chains of sexual abuse.
 We want to do this by giving 10 sexually abused women from Carson, California free mental health counseling for 1 whole year. 
Sexual abuse doesn't discriminate based on age. We want to address this by having each of these women represent an age range, with two women from their             teens, 20's, 30's, 40's, and 50's.
This counseling is designed to help these diverse women overcome the psychological, emotional, and spiritual effects of their traumatic sexual experiences, all while free from financial burdens. 

Who are we?



We are Yeshua Ministries International:
A non-profit ministry that is devoted to providing counseling, therapy, and ministerial services to under served communities.                                 Yeshua Ministries International was founded in 2010 by                         Pastor Mirlande Amazan, LCSW, MSW



       Pastor Mirlande Amazan has mental health counseling, therapy and social work           experience spanning over 15 years, and has been in ministry for over 23 years.                    
 With a License in Clinical Social Work and a Master's in Social Work, she understands both the science and the craft of mental health therapy.



During her time in social work, Pastor Amazan has counseled sexual abuse victims of all ages, and understands the process it takes to overcome the devastating effects of sexual trauma. 

YMI's counseling & therapy covers psychological, emotional, and spiritual elements of trauma to create a holistic healing process. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Yeshua Ministries International office is based in Rancho Palos Verdes. For the past 3 years, we have served the area of Carson California under a partnership with Resurrection Church LA, and here is where we found a community that was in great need of counseling. 


It is rare for communities like Carson CA to have mental health counseling. Within this community, we've found that counseling and therapy is not viewed as necessary. This is because of the steep costs of counseling.


Where does my donation go?

     Your donation goes directly to the costs it takes for counseling.

Normally, we would have to charge clients $100-150/session, and many times YMI functions on a sliding scale and even performs many pro-bono sessions. However, in order to cover our overhead costs of labor, office space, utilities, which total $1500/month, we must charge at least $100/session in order to avoid going into a deficit. 
Over the course of one year, YMI spends $18,000 to cover overhead costs, and these costs are being paid by the people we are trying to help. 
 Although our clients need counseling every week, it is far too expensive for them to come continually. Many times we see our clients discontinue the counseling that is changing their lives all because of monetary constraints.
We would like to raise money so they can continually receive help without worrying about their finances. They already have enough to worry about.
We ask for enough donations to cover a year because continual counseling leads to  exponential development in one's emotional, psychological, and spiritual health. Weekly counseling helps them grow incrementally, and their progress occurs over time. 

Why this campaign?

Sexual abuse is one of the most traumatizing forms of abuse that can occur. The pain and trauma occurs on a  chemical, emotional, psychological, and even spiritual level. Because of this, it takes extra time to reverse the effects, so blessing women who have undergone this is one of our passions. 

The more you give, the more women we can help With your donation, you will be changing the life of 100 sexually abused women.        We started the goal of this campaign at $18,000 for 10 people, but there are many more woman that are also in need of this therapy. If we exceed our goal, we will give free counseling to as many women as possible. 
Also if we exceed our goal, we would like to make video documentaries  for all of the contributors to see. In this way, you can see the effect your donation has directly. This will only occur, however, if we meet and exceed our goal.
If we do not meet our goal, we will use what we receive to give as many women free counseling as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help
 Even if you can't give, spreading the word to others is equally a blessing. Please share the link of this page with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, or any other form of social media. Even telling your friends and family about the campaign will help. 

To learn more about Yeshua Ministries International, visit www.yeshuaministriesintl.org

story:
How we doing World...

Khose Muchimba here, from Washington DC, originally from Lusaka Zambia...! My Campaign is very simple, gather beryl ore, send it to America & China, they will extract beryllium metal for use in most hospital wide world.
The Funds will cover shipment cost (land & sea)...mining cost and labor.

Funds:

The $25,000 needed is a small amount when you realize what beryllium metal is and how important it is to our day to day life's.
If you look at the imagine of beryl ore, it might seem just like any other precious/semi precious stone...the ore produces the beryllium which does not occur naturally, thus the need to extract it.
Hopefully the target will be reached, if not...i guess the funds will be refunded to every good heart that has made an effort. Thank you.

The Impact

Take a moment and look up beryllium uses...you will be amazed...from NASA using the metal in space, Hospital equipment"s and right down to you phones & tablets...

But to be precise, this project is strictly to extract this metal and let it be used for our own humanity benefits...

Risks & Challenges

From the point of mining the ore to loading the containers on the vessel...we can only hope that no forces of nature interfere...other than that, this is one material that is so important yet not most people are aware...i guess we all leave and learn.

Other Ways You Can Help

Well...i guess information is key in this life...and if you don"t have the means, be thankful that you have acquired a-bit of knowledge...and please read more on beryllium metal.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We are getting our acts together for the Miss Tibet Pageant 2016, which will be held in McLeod Ganj, India, from 3 to 5 June 2016.

The Miss Tibet Pageant has been a media darling. It has played an important role in providing the young Tibetan women a contemporary platform to showcase their talents and aspirations. It has also provided them international travelling and cross cultural exchanges.

There will be seven rounds over three days in the Pageant. The participants will arrive in McLeod a few days before for rehearsals, excursions and other activities.

The winner will be given a cash prize of India rupees one lakh (100,000), the first runner-up will be given 50,000 rupees and second runner-up 25,000.

The total cost of the event will be around 10,000 USD. Following is the breakdown of the expenses:

Food and accommodation; Local transportation; Stage and sound; Event venues;
Printing hoardings, magazine, posters, tickets and cheques; Communication costs;
Judges' honorariums; Tables and chairs; Office supplies; Photo and video;
Sash; Crown; Fireworks; Make-up; Website; Staff; Miscellaneous.

We need your support to make this event a success. Please make whatever contribution you can make, and make a difference!

Read more at misstibet.com

Lobsang Wangyal
Director

story:
Vintage Villains, is a Retro Gaming Store located in the rapidly growing city of Danville, Illinois.  We specialize in retro/new video games, accessories, vintage/new toys, as well as comics, DVDs, CDs, posters, clothing, trading card games and more.  The store itself has been in several different locations since 2011, and with each move we've expanded and improved upon our previous space. The new location of Vintage Villains will finally allow our business to incorporate many of the ideas we have wanted since day one but were limited because of space restraints.  Several of those ideas are as follows:

  • The addition of an in house retro gaming museum.
  • Space to house local all age events such as concerts, stand up, theater, wrestling, gaming tournaments and more.
  • Expanding our ever growing FREE TO PLAY arcade.
   The move to the new location began in late January, and will continue until our tentative opening date of April 1st 2014.  This is an extremely ambitious and risky move for Vintage Villains; and comes at a high cost! We are seeking help from backers to help fund this transition and to help make this move as smooth as possible. We are hoping to raise $30,000 to cover some of our many expenses. Budget break down is as follows.

  • $10,000 PA and Light Budget for the entertainment center
  • $6600 Arcade Repair and Expansion
  • $1600 Folding Chairs (100)
  • $2000 Construction Supplies
  • $4500 Museum Displays
  • $2000 New Store Displays
  • $500 Stage
  • $1200 New Tables (20)
  • $1600 Licensed Workers (Electrical, General Contractor)
  • If extra money is made during this funding campaign the money will be used to further expand the Arcade and Museum areas of the shop.
     We strongly believe this project will be one of the several stepping stones that helps to breath new life into our beautiful downtown area in Danville, Illinois. You can help make this a reality by contributing and becoming a backer of this project today!

     For additional information on the expansion keep reading below!

     Our video game museum will will take people back to the glory days of video gaming and where it all began!  We will house a large selection of well known and many lesser known video game consoles.  All will be on display with information regarding release, production and history of the console.  From 1970 to current generation - it will be something this area has not seen before!


     Vintage Villains at present houses a free to play arcade that incorporates 7 Free to play arcade machines as well as 2 Free to play pinball machines.  We are looking to expand the arcade to over twenty machines and several new pinball machines.  All of this will always remain FREE to the public to play.  We also have several machines that are in need of repairs such as new monitors and boards that need to be rebuilt which will be added to the arcade as well.

     Lastly we will house a 6,500sq foot All Age entertainment venue.  Within this space you can expect to see local and regional bands along with comedy acts, theater, movie screenings, live wrestling and anything else we can think up! The possibilities are endless.  We will also be the home for Trading Card Game Tournaments as well as video game tournaments..


Final Thoughts..

     This has always been a dream of ours not just as adults but as kids, I mean come on, what kid didn't want to own his own comic shop.  Over the last few years nothing in this business has been more exciting than seeing families come though our doors and share the same experiences that we had as children when collectible comic shops were plentiful.  Hearing how happy they are that something like this exists in our community really energizes us.  You can help - whether it be a donation or just stopping in and offering to lend some of your spare time to the move.  Every last bit of it is appreciated.  See you all soon!

-Vintage Villains

story:
Skaptobara is an idea for an AUBG hub in downtown Sofia with a relaxed atmosphere, delicious food, good music and drinks. The lounge bar will give preference to everything AUBG related in terms of events, atmosphere, decoration, etc. 

We made a survey not so long ago and the common perception is that we don't meet all that often after we graduate and maybe part of the reason is, we don't have a place to predispose us to. Networking events, club reunions, beer-pong or just regular fun, most people (above 80%) said that they'd come to such a place to hang out with fellow alumni. 

We will work together with AAA to organize alumni events, but will also keep our agenda busy to have more and more reasons to drink/eat/have fun together. We would love to bring things along the lines of the Ghastly Bunch, AURA's Sunday meetings or the American Football nights back (of course, with a different format now), but anything else AUBG related in any way is welcome. Just approach us.

Our goal is to make this as cozy as possible and we need your support for this. The money raised here will go towards putting on the final touches of the interior design and furnishing, as well as acquiring games (board games, a console, console games) and other equipment. Any suggestions and comments will be greatly appreciated.

Risks and challenges 

We will try and be as prepared as possible for the opening night on Friday, November 22. But the bar will always evolve and will do its best to stay true to the AUBG spirit.

story:
PURP.ME:

We are a group of college students from Louisville, KY who started giving back and accidentally started a movement.  We were not expecting to even start a movement and it quickly spread to over 60,000 facebook likes and over 43,000 twitter followers.  People wanted to start buying the shirts and wristbands we had been giving away for free at the Boys and Girls Club.  So we started to sell purp wristbands to pay for this movement. It was amazing to see how many young kids were excited about giving back and wanting to start a Purp Team.  High schoolers all over Louisville, KY started unofficial purp team's and now we even have an unoffical purp team in Los Angeles,CA.  Other people from cities all over contact us about wanting to start a Purp Team but we don't have the resources.  We need your help to get the resources to organize these people who want to start purp teams. 

We brainstormed and came up with a way to make helping people fun, easy, and rewarding for the first time ever.  Please watch the video above to really understand the idea and the movement.  

We are a registered Non Profit with the State of Kentucky but now we are at the point where we need to make this official and become a 501(c)3 tax exempt.  If you would like to wait until we are tax exempt to make a donation, please email purpmenow@gmail.com and we will contact you once we are tax exempt.

 All of this movement was without our app or Purp points.  Imagine what the movement would look like with the app and the purp points.  The app would be available for all people free of charge.

What we will do with the money:

We will spend the $10,000 on the following:

  • A lawyer to help finish filing our 501(c)3 and trademark response letter
  • A new website that has a donation button, newsletter sign up, shop, and blog
  • Printed materials to send to people wanting to start purp teams
  • Marketing materials

Anything more than $10,000, will be spent on the following:

  • A mascot 
  • The app
  • Rewards for purp points
  • Purp Rallies and live events at the schools
  • Merchandise prototypes to sell online, to generate revenue for purp.me

Your Perks:

  • You will help start a movement that all people of the world can be apart of
  • You will help make the golden rule golden
  • You will help ignite the compassion of a teenage generation who are already wating to start purp teams
  • You will get Limited Edition "I started Purp.me" gear for helping us start Purp.me.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Use the Indiegogo share tool, and share our campaign on facebook, instagram, twitter, email and anywhere else you can.
  • Follow us on twitter and instagram @purpme

About us:

Jason Reynolds:

  • Quit my MBA to work full time starting the Purp Movement
  • BA in Business Management from the University of Louisville
  • Love to help people

Jamal Brown:

  • Quit UPS to work full time starting the Purp Movement
  • Plays piano and sings for Purp.Me Parties 
  • Loves to help people

Graham Maupin

  • Performs magic at Purp.Me Parties
  • Started the Handy-Helpers Purp Team
  • Inspires people by not letting cerebral palsy slow Graham down
