Advocate for the development of adaptive gear for injured and disabled veterans to join the community on the water. Inspire veterans, and their loved ones, to take back their extraordinary lives and achieve something great!

story:
Do not Let our name foul you WTF Events Inc.

C4 - Charity movie cars -  We are a 501C Pending company based out of Ventura CA which puts on community based events and works with several local as well as national non profit groups.

We have decided to not only to  do events but support the community with the creation of popular movie vehicles that can help brighten up any ones day no matter what they might be going through. This includes taking the vehicles to children's hospitals, community outreach programs, schools, libraries, Parades, or any where that can help the community.

Our first Vehicle is the one and only Mystery Machine Van from the iconic Cartoon Scooby-Doo.

We have already got the Van. A 1967 Chevy G20 (the one in the cartoon) which we have completely rebuilt. the main elements of . It has a new Engine, new transmission, new wiring(in process), Windshield, Stereo, wheels and tires, and the iconic paint job. With all of this we have already spent several thousands of dollars to make this dream come true.

But we need your help to finish it. we want to completely rebuild the inside, so we can give people rides in it. The ultimate goal is to be able to take kids who are sick for rides in the amazing Mystery Inc van.

We have pulled out the interior including all the wall panels. which will be replaced with brand new ones with themed  artistic murals by local artists for everyone to enjoy for years to come.

the interior will include two bench seats forming a L shape in the back, shag carpet, lights, specialty seating for sick kids, new seat covers for the front, a special dash cover, a horn that plays Scooby Doo's laugh a exterior speaker covered by a custom built prop cover that looks like the iconic spare tire in the cartoon. this speaker will be used for playing music and annoucements  at the events we attend.

This is our way of bringing smiles to everyone we see even when there isn't anything else to smile about.

Future aspects of this vehicle will include

*Anti Bullying Campaign  * Stay in School   * everyone reads


What We Need & What You Get

We need to reach $6,500 to complete this project 

$6,000 will go to the interior to make the vehicle safe and secure 

This includes the new panels being cut to custom fit and the artist materials to 

complete the murals.

The custom L shaped bench in the back, with the safety devices needed for sick 

kids to be able to ride. draws underneath the seats to keep extra equipment.

The two custom seat covers for the front

The Scooby- Doo horn. 

The speaker in the front of the van covered by the iconic spare tire from the cartoon.

This is actually valued over $15,000 but we have already made some deals to get 

it reduced due to the nature of the vehicle 

The remainder of the money will go to a mascot costume of Scooby-Doo and promotion material to give away at events. 


The Awesome Perks.

We have exclusive bumper stickers, cosplay prints, artist prints, t-shirts, 

C4 comic con passes, Original art, even an exclusive bring the van to your door 

If we do not reach our goal we will complete as much as possible with what we 

receive. Going with the most import aspects first. 


The Impact

Making lasting Memories for everyone who comes in contact with this amazing vehicle.


Risks & Challenges

We have been working on this for several months and have found some amazing

 people to help us see our dream come true. 

The biggest risk is not finishing this project and letting down all the amazing

 people who have donated their time and skills to help make this a reality. We will 

never give up in changing lives and helping our community one day at a time.


Other Ways You Can Help

We offer all kinds of ways to help us reach this project end.

One being share this project with your friends and family.

But we also offer donations as little as $2. Almost everyone has two dollars to 

help their community and the children in it.

 people who have donated their time and skills to help make this a reality. We will 
never give up in changing lives and helping our community one day at a time.

Other Ways You Can Help
We offer all kinds of ways to help us reach this project end.
One being share this project with your friends and family.
But we also offer donations as little as $2. Almost everyone has two dollars to 
help their community and the children in it.

story:
Split, tip, pay, and share!


Full Society is an iPhone app (+Android if we hit $50k stretch goal) that allows you to view your bill, split it easily with friends, tip, pay (with ApplePay, Paypal, Venmo, credit/debit card), and leave at any time. YOU are in control. No bartender or server required.

The Full Society app connects you to nearby restaurants and bars. Convenient, seamless, and socially conscious: our mission is to give a meal to someone in need for every table that pays through our app.

The idea of "Full Society" is that you feel FULL from eating out, and you feel FULL by helping provide a meal for others after paying your bill.  The result? A FULL society!

"I have been waiting for someone to solve this annoying restaurant problem for years" - Leo Khin, Chapter Director of Start Up Grind 

"Full Society is the best restaurant app on the East Coast! Paige is a truly gifted entrepreneur!" - Johns Hopkins Innovation Factory 

“We applaud Full Society for its vision and compassion, and we celebrate this launch!”  - Robert Gehman, Executive Director of Helping Up Mission 


As Featured In:

(See our press page!)


In today's world, our lives are busy enough! Full Society will save you TIME when you eat out, make your dining experience MORE enjoyable, and LESS awkward (e.g. the horrors of splitting the bill between 10 friends at last call).








Click here to learn more about beacons!



Full Society is a socially conscious and sustainable company. We want to cut down on paper receipts (who wants to keep track of those anyway?) and change the way we think about society. 

Our app is focused on giving back to the community, a desire that many of us have as our society becomes more interconnected. The social media integration also generates positive personal promotion for the users (and restaurants) among their peers. Our goal is to be a social enterprise that attempts to bridge gaps in society through business solutions.


Let’s not be silly.

We don’t expect that every single American will go out to eat exactly once every 5 days and donate $1.25 every time. But, we do believe that there are a large number of people who will. Those people will have a HUGE impact!

Many Americans are surprised to learn how big of a problem hunger is in our own country: 1 in 6 people in America go hungry every night.

Our Non-Profit Partners: If you choose to donate, where will the money go?

We provide meals by partnering with non-profits. In-app donations are sent to these organizations to provide meals directly to those in need.



  • Our Founder The initial concept for Full Society was born in a class at Johns Hopkins. Having waited tables and bar-tended in crowded restaurants in the past, Paige (founder) saw a dire need for ways in which restaurants could save time. After writing a 40 page research paper on industry trends and analysis, creating user surveys, and conducting numerous interviews with restaurant owners, she put together a team and went straight to work developing the product. Paige is a Johns Hopkins University graduate who has worked in finance for the past 6 years. Last year she went back to grad school to get her MBA and that’s when Full Society came about. 
  • The Founding Team includes two University of Delaware graduates (Lauren “The Lorax” Cantlin and Jamie “Jambles” Winder) and a University of Maryland graduate, Mike Klicos, also known as “Dad." Lauren brings years of creative design and writing experience to the team, while Jamie has similar writing experience in addition to strong communications and marketing skills. And Mike, the only non-female member, brings over 15 years of restaurant experience to the team.  We also partnered with Bolster Labs to do our technical development and design. 
  • Most importantly, the entire team is deeply passionate and determined to help others. Full Society wants to take all necessary risks required to do what we believe is right for our community and beyond. We are a bootstrapped business, having just recently accepted $25k in seed funding from the Accelerate Baltimore Program. 

Awards and Competitions:

  • Accelerate Baltimore 2015 Winner (recipient of $25k funding)
  • Johns Hopkins University Business Plan Competition Finalist 2015
  • Invest Maryland SemiFinalist 2015
  • Johns Hopkins University Innovation Factory Startup Winner 2014
  • StartUp Maryland Great 8 Finalist 2014

Traction:

  • 2,100 interested pre-users 
  • Pilot program set to launch MVP (Minimum Viable Product) Summer 2015 in 25 restaurants

Technology:

  • Technical Proof of Concept: Complete!
  • Experience Prototype: Complete!

We are so close! We still need to finish technical development to get our MVP to launch. We also believe that marketing is key in getting user adoption at our onset and beyond. Help us spread the word about America's dire need for a society full of happy, well-fed people. When you receive, you should give back. That is what creates a Full Society!

Note that the Full Society team is a lean startup. We've made ourselves successful by making our wants few (scrounging up ramen, crackers on the floor, and anything else we can find to sustain ourselves). We are entirely unpaid working around the clock on this project.

Your funding will allow us to:

  • Aquire 5,000 users
  • Finish technical development
  • Launch iPhone app publicly in Apple app store


STRETCH GOAL: $50,000 

  • If we hit our stretch goal, we will launch our product in July 2015 for both iPhone AND Android users!!


Perks

Since our motto is to give back, we want to make sure that Full Society's backers receive rewards that make them feel full.


Dinner Lab - Our FAVORITE Perk

Dinner Lab website, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin and Pinterest.

blog

What is Dinner Lab? 

Dinner Lab is a company that similarly utilizes the restaurant industry as an innovative tool for bringing foodies together. Dinner Lab creates an elevated restaurant experience by having strangers meet together for the first time to try elevated cuisine crafted by chefs all over America. Dinner Lab is already operating in over 20 locations nationwide and they want to expand further. By helping us, you help Dinner Lab, hungry Americans and yourselves to some incredible meals at a crazy good price. What's not to like?


As a Dinner Lab member, you'll have access to incredible cutting-edge food events in the city of your choice!

We believe this partnership will help foster a more integrated food community, not only in our hometown of Baltimore, but all over America. We highly suggest taking a look at Dinner Lab, even if you choose to back us at a lower rewards level.


Challenges

What would life be without a little risk? We've already experienced several challenges and we are certain there will be more to come.

Our biggest concern is our ability to get to market quickly. Although the mobile payments industry is still very nascent, there are many startups in addition to fully developed companies encroaching upon the space. We are still exploring options to help us quickly expand to restaurants across the country.

To lessen this risk, we are currently focused on forming strategic partnerships that will help us expand and scale quickly.

Another risk we face is delay in the technical development timeline due to additional unexpected work needed. We went through a very thorough requirements definition with Bolster Labs to ensure that this will not be likely to happen.


More About the Team

The truth? Here is how the team came to be:

Paige and Mike went to high school together. Paige knew mike was smart from taking AP calculus with him. They parted ways for college and worked in different industries but always stayed close friends. When Paige was 5, her sister Lauren was born, thus saving her from being the self-absorbed only child she otherwise most certainly would have been. During her MBA, Paige solicited Lauren’s help to learn graphic design for some of her projects. That’s when Lauren realized the potential for Full Society and encouraged her sister to move forward. They searched high and low for a free intern who was intelligent and hardworking (nearly impossible). Somehow Lauren convinced Jamie to get behind the project and move from New Jersey to Baltimore to be with us full time. Paige, Mike, Lauren, and Jamie have been together ever since.

Fun Facts:


To learn more about us, check out our blog updates! You’ll enjoy all sorts of short tales from our hilarious little startup lives.

We are Full Society, a four-member team based out of Baltimore that wants to make going out to eat more convenient for both customers and restaurant staff while directly benefiting the greater community around us.

Our ultimate goal? Make everyone full by giving back to those in need, one table at a time.

Thanks for backing our project!

story:
Hi friends, family and colleagues,
I am excited to let you know that I am the newest Board Member of the East Los Angeles Women's Center (ELAWC)! 

The mission of the East Los Angeles Women’s Center is to ensure that all women, girls and their families live in a place of safety, health, and personal well-being, free from violence and abuse.  Our center is a trusted resource, supporting survivors of trauma and violence every step of the way, from crisis and accompaniment, to counseling and education, to health and healing.  

As a Board Member I am responsible for helping to raise awareness and funds for their crucial services.

Every spring The East Los Angeles Women’s Center (ELAWC) honors the spirit of success and service at our Mujeres de Paz Annual Awards Dinner. We celebrate the achievements of the women, girls and families we serve as well as the commitments of volunteers, organizations, and individuals who make changing hearts and live a centerpiece of their service.

I would like to raise $1,000 in time for the Awards dinner held on March 27th.  The money goes to fund services for victims/survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault with a particular focus on working with women in the East Los Angeles area.

Any amount will make a difference so please donate whatever you can. If you can contribute $100 then you can also attend the Awards dinner! It should be an inspiring evening with great views from Luminarias Restaurant.

If you cannot help financially you can still help by spreading the word and forwarding this campaign to your networks.

Gracias, Si Se Puede!

story:
We need help to get our first futuristic product up and running. We are at the prototyping stage where we have a prototype but we still have many things to do including licensing, marketing and more. Thank you for your support. 


Our Story

How it all started

We started back in april of 2012 with the dream of building one of the most futuristic computers in the world. We knew our competition, which there wasn't much of, and we had the concept, so we were ready to start prototyping.


Prototyping

The GTouch has taken about a year and a half to complete up to this stage of prototyping. We have created a working model that was used by the sharks on Shark Tank. This prototype runs with a projector displaying the image which at the moment is impractical so we have recently decided to switch to a transparent LCD. 


The Journey

Baise Industries has taken on many hitches in starting up, from parts of the prototype not working to not getting an investment on Shark Tank. That's why we're here, on Indiegogo... We Need You. We are only a few months out from being ready for the market but we can only get there with you help. We need the funding to pay for software licensing, manufacturing and essentially just establishment. 


  




Perks

The perks are fairly basic except for a couple complicated ones so lets clarify. At the moment there are a few perks that include hardware. Any perks that include hardware have specs as follows: 

  • intel core i5 3.2ghz
  • 128GB SSD storage
  • 500GB HDD storage
  • 8GB of RAM
This is upgradable to:

  • intel quad-core i7 4.0ghz
  • 512GB SSD storage 
  • 1TB HDD storage
  • 16GB of RAM
You can purchase this upgrade with the hardware upgrade perk.

story:
Update:

Although we've fixed the previous PayPal issue, and some people are able to contribute, we're still receiving messages that people cannot get their contributions through. Honestly, we have no idea what's happening. Indiegogo has told us that the only way they can solve the issue is if you contact them individually: support@indiegogo.com

Alternatively you can email 'rob [at] refuture.co' and we can help by organising contributions on your behalf. Sorry for the inconvenience! 


"The environment". Let's be honest...the moment a person brings up the word, we immediately start to feel bad about ourselves. "I'm not doing enough" and "I should do more" is how we feel. We start to defend our actions not because we don't want to help, but because we see the problem as too hard to fix and adding discomfort to our daily lives. In our past experiences, we've encountered too many eco-products that either don't work well, are expensive, or require too much effort with minimal results. Although that may be far from the truth now, environmentalism's reputation precedes itself and to put it bluntly...it's not seen as 'cool'.

The Refuture app is a simple tool that transforms all of your positive daily actions into points that are ranked against our friends on a social platform. If you walk to work rather than drive your car, you gain points. If you spend less on your electricity bill, you gain points. This allows people to track their progress, motivate themselves and their friends, and most importantly see the collective impact they have on the world as a group. We've gamified the experience. Ultimately, it makes it easier for people to do good by encouraging them to do more of what they're already doing right, rather than forcing new uncomfortable behaviours. We believe that the only way to truly take sustainability to the next level is not to go against the mainstream, but to go with it. 

We want you to be a part of this movement of changing the face of sustainability into something new. Into something you're likely to find on your Instagram feed, not in the trunk of your hippie uncle's car.  


THE APP


What does the Refuture App do?
  1. Tracks the positive actions of each user into a point system.
  2. Shows the collective impact the user has with friends and communities.
  3. Ignites social competition through ranks, goals, levels, and achievements.

PROGRESS is important because by keeping track of ourselves, it enables us to maintain motivation to build the right habits. Refuture converts all positive actions into points and displays the user's world impact in an understandable context. Walking to work, recycling waste, using less water, etc. will award the user points according to their performance against the community average.

COMMUNITIES is how people can see the collective impact they are having on the world. Users can join multiple communities such as friends, city, country, workplace, clubs, etc. All users inside the community will have their points aggregated to a total with a collective goal target set each month. This allows for some friendly competition beyond borders:

London vs. Sydney, Harvard vs. Columbia, Nike vs. Adidas. 

By showing people that they are part of a larger movement and giving community goals, people will be more motivated and will likely build habits. 

PROFILES enable users to see their progress, badges, and most importantly world impact. Know how much positive impact you've made at all times and understand it in easy terms: how many trees planted, how much water saved, etc. 

STAY ON TOP OF YOUR DATA, we all know how much we spend on bills per month, but we don't know if we're spending more or less than our past. Refuture puts all of our activities in context to our surroundings by showing our personal progress against our own past and friends/communities.


SOCIAL COMPETITION is a large aspect of this platform; by understanding how much we're doing in comparison to our friends, we apply peer pressure to each other to do more. This motivates the user by providing worldly context of their impact. 



WHY IS THIS IMPORTANT?

Sustainability affects everybody no matter where you are or how much you earn - an issue beyond any borders. The problem is both large and multi-faceted, but the angle often not tackled is that of social behaviour and cultural desire. This how our founder got involved in sustainability: 




THE IMPACT

Refuture isn't just an app, it's a vision for making sustainability approachable for all. By changing the perception of environmentalism and building the habits for positive behaviours, we're helping to alter the social landscape for adopting sustainable living. So by supporting Refuture you're not just helping one project, you're helping all sustainability initiatives as a greater movement. When consumer desires change, businesses will adapt to meet them, and we truly have a self-feeding cycle for change.

We've received the support from OpenIDEO sponsored by Coca-Cola Enterprises in the recycling challenge where Refuture was selected as winner amongst 200+ ideas; we received feedback and support from hundreds of OpenIDEO community members around the world. This project is the accumulation of a global effort and now we need your help to bring Refuture to people's lives. A special shout out to Jes Simson and Sky Gilbar for all their community feedback and support - you guys are awesome!


WHERE ARE WE NOW

We've gone through all the branding, design and wireframes for Refuture. We've prepared our market entrance strategy and laid out the best path to market using lean start-up methodology. Our experienced app development partners have mapped the app and identified the core functions for creating the MVP (minimum viable product), so we have a clear idea of the costs involved for our development phases. 

We need $15,000 to create the core functions of data tracking/input along with the algorithm to convert the data into points. The hours that go into development as well as server costs for storing all the data when the app goes live is where the money will go. Once we have this phase completed, we can begin taking Refuture to the world for real usage and testing. 

Please donate and share this campaign to your friends and family. We will be very grateful for any kind of support. :)

Thank you so much!

Refuture Team



ABOUT US

Who is the founder?

Rob Han specializes in brand management and creative direction, with a background in the luxury fashion industry. His idea has always been to take the consumer behaviour learnings from mass-market fields and apply them to his passions in sustainability, technology, and education. Born in Australia and used to great air and nature, his travels around the world and work in China has led to the realisation of the sustainability issues the world faces. This has been the driving force for him to start Refuture.  

Who is the Refuture team?

We're a bunch of people working in day jobs that aren't related to sustainability per se but want to do more for the world. Refuture is that avenue for us. We're involved in driving modern culture through branding, design, communications, and digital development. Our team takes their skills from commercial fields such as fashion, consumer products and events, and applies them to areas like sustainability to attack the issue from new angles. 


-----

PERKS

For supporting us, we've created some great perks for your generosity. Check them out below! Some images are renderings so the final product may differ from the image seen - but we promise it'll still be awesome. 

Secret Lifehacks Collection - You often wonder how everyone else seems to manage their time and keep on top of everything. The Refuture team never has enough hours in their day either and has put together a secret collection of productivity hacks we use to be stay ahead of time - 50 of you will now have the chance to get their hands on them.
--

Secret Design Collection - Love our design? We are obsessed with everything design-related and have spent many years carefully collecting and curating our favourite design inspiration sources. We're now sharing them with 50 of you in the hopes to tickle your creative bones and inspire you to create great things.
--

Refuture Pioneer - According to Urban Dictionary, a pioneer is "anything that is from an earlier era and looked upon with high regard or respect." They certainly got that right. This limited-edition 'Pioneer Profile' on the app will show that you are one of the first 100 movers and supporters of the Refuture vision.
--

Refuture Beta Tester - The moment the Refuture App gets made into reality, you'll be the first to know. You will receive a special invitation to be one of the first private beta-testers for this app (a little like receiving the golden ticket - note Willy Wonka reference). Awesome much? You'll also get a beta-tester badge for your profile.

--

Tote Bag - We can't get enough of tote bags - well designed ones, that is. This is one that you'd be able to take to the beach, grocery store, or even on a weekend roadtrip if you're looking to get adventurous. The Refuture team will even throw in a "Secret Collection" of your choosing. 
--

Custom Hand-drawn Name - Our illustrator from Flyghte will create a hand-drawing, commissioned especially for you. The original illustration (A5 size) will be mailed to your doorstep, and you'll be able to display it wherever you please. Comes with a digital scan too if you'd prefer. 
--

Mystery Box of Modern China - With the Refuture team coming from all around the world and finding themselves in Shanghai, we've come across a fair share of weird and wonderful things and would like to share them with you. You will be sent a box of strange items that can only be found in modern China. Hilarity is to be expected. This is the limited early-bird special.
--

Big Mystery Box of Modern China - Same as a regular Mystery Box, but only bigger. And in this case, bigger...is better. 
--

IDEO Studio Tour - We're very happy to announce this amazing perk sponsored by IDEO, the first backer to this perk will receive a special tour of their San Francisco studio. Rated as one of the most innovative companies in the world, we don't need to emphasize how awesome having a chance to look at how they work is. Don't sleep on this one, you'll regret it!
--

Badge of Honor - This is one you will want to have - a badge will be named after you on the Refuture App. You'll be able to sit down with us (probably virtually) and brainstorm on what users have to do to earn those badges. 
--

We Are Your Eyes & Ears - People hear crazy things about China all the time. Is it true? Well, most likely. If you have not yet had a chance to visit this mysterious country, do not fret. We'll take you on a special kind of tour. We'll make a list of things that you might find interesting - pick out a few and we'll be your eyes and ears, recording as we go and making comments on what we see. If you're lucky, you might even get the opportunity to pick some out for us...although I can already foresee some evil people making us eat buckets of chicken feet. And yes, they do sell them at almost every corner. 
--

Refuture Collaborator - You'll gain special inside access to the team's work on Refuture with the opportunity to collaborate and give direct feedback. You will also be listed as a special contributor on the Refuture App credits and website. A great one for those who want to be involved and have a hands-on experience.
--

Refuture Team Meet - You'll gain special inside access to the team's work on Refuture with the opportunity to collaborate and give direct feedback. You will also be listed as a special contributor on the Refuture App credits and website. As a bonus, the Refuture team will prepare a home-cooked dinner and meet you for a meal (location to be discussed). We're great cooks. :)
--



FAQ

What is the Refuture app?

The Refuture app is a simple tool that tracks all of your positive daily actions into points that are ranked against your friends on a social platform. It helps to create good habits and aims to keep people motivated by providing social competition and showing collective impact.  

Why are you doing this?

Sustainability is an issue shared by all of us, but it's only being tackled by a small group of people. That's not enough. We want to make sustainability something that normal people can smoothly incorporate in their lives every day, not just the people already living green. We believe people do have the desire to help - they just find it difficult to do so. So we're planting the first seeds for a bigger movement.  

How are you different?

We're not the first to gamify sustainability but we are the first to do so in a way that speaks to regular people. Our branding, design and strategy all revolves around speaking our modern society's language. We aim to provide value and utility to our user's lives first and foremost, then only after that can we consider sustainability.  

What are the donations going towards?

The $15,000 will fund the mvp (minimum viable product) development for the app, which is the creation of the data tracking and input functions, as well as the algorithm to transform the data into points. To go further, we need to do real user testing. We've come to this number by analyzing the scope of work and cost of development among quality partners.  

If you have any feedback or ideas on what you'd like to be included in the Refuture app, feel free to reach out to us. Or if you'd like to get involved with our team, send us a message! :)

Thank you for your time!
story_txt:
Update:Although we've fixed the previous PayPal issue, and some people are able to contribute, we're still receiving messages that people cannot get their contributions through. Honestly, we have no idea what's happening. Indiegogo has told us that the only way they can solve the issue is if you contact them individually: support@indiegogo.comAlternatively you can email 'rob [at] refuture.co' and we can help by organising contributions on your behalf. Sorry for the inconvenience! 




"The environment". Let's be honest...the moment a person brings up the word, we immediately start to feel bad about ourselves. "I'm not doing enough" and "I should do more" is how we feel. We start to defend our actions not because we don't want to help, but because we see the problem as too hard to fix and adding discomfort to our daily lives. In our past experiences, we've encountered too many eco-products that either don't work well, are expensive, or require too much effort with minimal results. Although that may be far from the truth now, environmentalism's reputation precedes itself and to put it bluntly...it's not seen as 'cool'.


The Refuture app is a simple tool that transforms all of your positive daily actions into points that are ranked against our friends on a social platform. If you walk to work rather than drive your car, you gain points. If you spend less on your electricity bill, you gain points. This allows people to track their progress, motivate themselves and their friends, and most importantly see the collective impact they have on the world as a group. We've gamified the experience. Ultimately, it makes it easier for people to do good by encouraging them to do more of what they're already doing right, rather than forcing new uncomfortable behaviours. We believe that the only way to truly take sustainability to the next level is not to go against the mainstream, but to go with it. 
We want you to be a part of this movement of changing the face of sustainability into something new. Into something you're likely to find on your Instagram feed, not in the trunk of your hippie uncle's car.  

THE APP




What does the Refuture App do?

Tracks the positive actions of each user into a point system.

Shows the collective impact the user has with friends and communities.

Ignites social competition through ranks, goals, levels, and achievements.





PROGRESS is important because by keeping track of ourselves, it enables us to maintain motivation to build the right habits. Refuture converts all positive actions into points and displays the user's world impact in an understandable context. Walking to work, recycling waste, using less water, etc. will award the user points according to their performance against the community average.






COMMUNITIES is how people can see the collective impact they are having on the world. Users can join multiple communities such as friends, city, country, workplace, clubs, etc. All users inside the community will have their points aggregated to a total with a collective goal target set each month. This allows for some friendly competition beyond borders:
London vs. Sydney, Harvard vs. Columbia, Nike vs. Adidas. 
By showing people that they are part of a larger movement and giving community goals, people will be more motivated and will likely build habits. 


PROFILES enable users to see their progress, badges, and most importantly world impact. Know how much positive impact you've made at all times and understand it in easy terms: how many trees planted, how much water saved, etc. 

STAY ON TOP OF YOUR DATA, we all know how much we spend on bills per month, but we don't know if we're spending more or less than our past. Refuture puts all of our activities in context to our surroundings by showing our personal progress against our own past and friends/communities.


SOCIAL COMPETITION is a large aspect of this platform; by understanding how much we're doing in comparison to our friends, we apply peer pressure to each other to do more. This motivates the user by providing worldly context of their impact. 


WHY IS THIS IMPORTANT?

Sustainability affects everybody no matter where you are or how much you earn - an issue beyond any borders. The problem is both large and multi-faceted, but the angle often not tackled is that of social behaviour and cultural desire. This how our founder got involved in sustainability: 



THE IMPACT
Refuture isn't just an app, it's a vision for making sustainability approachable for all. By changing the perception of environmentalism and building the habits for positive behaviours, we're helping to alter the social landscape for adopting sustainable living. So by supporting Refuture you're not just helping one project, you're helping all sustainability initiatives as a greater movement. When consumer desires change, businesses will adapt to meet them, and we truly have a self-feeding cycle for change.

We've received the support from OpenIDEO sponsored by Coca-Cola Enterprises in the recycling challenge where Refuture was selected as winner amongst 200+ ideas; we received feedback and support from hundreds of OpenIDEO community members around the world. This project is the accumulation of a global effort and now we need your help to bring Refuture to people's lives. A special shout out to Jes Simson and Sky Gilbar for all their community feedback and support - you guys are awesome!


WHERE ARE WE NOW


We've gone through all the branding, design and wireframes for Refuture. We've prepared our market entrance strategy and laid out the best path to market using lean start-up methodology. Our experienced app development partners have mapped the app and identified the core functions for creating the MVP (minimum viable product), so we have a clear idea of the costs involved for our development phases. 
We need $15,000 to create the core functions of data tracking/input along with the algorithm to convert the data into points. The hours that go into development as well as server costs for storing all the data when the app goes live is where the money will go. Once we have this phase completed, we can begin taking Refuture to the world for real usage and testing. 

Please donate and share this campaign to your friends and family. We will be very grateful for any kind of support. :)
Thank you so much!
Refuture Team



ABOUT US



Who is the founder?





Rob Han specializes in brand management and creative direction, with a background in the luxury fashion industry. His idea has always been to take the consumer behaviour learnings from mass-market fields and apply them to his passions in sustainability, technology, and education. Born in Australia and used to great air and nature, his travels around the world and work in China has led to the realisation of the sustainability issues the world faces. This has been the driving force for him to start Refuture.  



Who is the Refuture team?




We're a bunch of people working in day jobs that aren't related to sustainability per se but want to do more for the world. Refuture is that avenue for us. We're involved in driving modern culture through branding, design, communications, and digital development. Our team takes their skills from commercial fields such as fashion, consumer products and events, and applies them to areas like sustainability to attack the issue from new angles. 


-----

PERKS
For supporting us, we've created some great perks for your generosity. Check them out below! Some images are renderings so the final product may differ from the image seen - but we promise it'll still be awesome. 



Secret Lifehacks Collection - You often wonder how everyone else seems to manage their time and keep on top of everything. The Refuture team never has enough hours in their day either and has put together a secret collection of productivity hacks we use to be stay ahead of time - 50 of you will now have the chance to get their hands on them.--



Secret Design Collection - Love our design? We are obsessed with everything design-related and have spent many years carefully collecting and curating our favourite design inspiration sources. We're now sharing them with 50 of you in the hopes to tickle your creative bones and inspire you to create great things.--


Refuture Pioneer - According to Urban Dictionary, a pioneer is "anything that is from an earlier era and looked upon with high regard or respect." They certainly got that right. This limited-edition 'Pioneer Profile' on the app will show that you are one of the first 100 movers and supporters of the Refuture vision.--

Refuture Beta Tester - The moment the Refuture App gets made into reality, you'll be the first to know. You will receive a special invitation to be one of the first private beta-testers for this app (a little like receiving the golden ticket - note Willy Wonka reference). Awesome much? You'll also get a beta-tester badge for your profile.
--


Tote Bag - We can't get enough of tote bags - well designed ones, that is. This is one that you'd be able to take to the beach, grocery store, or even on a weekend roadtrip if you're looking to get adventurous. The Refuture team will even throw in a "Secret Collection" of your choosing. --




Custom Hand-drawn Name - Our illustrator from Flyghte will create a hand-drawing, commissioned especially for you. The original illustration (A5 size) will be mailed to your doorstep, and you'll be able to display it wherever you please. Comes with a digital scan too if you'd prefer. --

Rated as one of the most innovative companies in the world, we don't need to emphasize how awesome having a chance to look at how they work is. Don't sleep on this one, you'll regret it!--


Badge of Honor - This is one you will want to have - a badge will be named after you on the Refuture App. You'll be able to sit down with us (probably virtually) and brainstorm on what users have to do to earn those badges. --

We Are Your Eyes & Ears - People hear crazy things about China all the time. Is it true? Well, most likely. If you have not yet had a chance to visit this mysterious country, do not fret. We'll take you on a special kind of tour. We'll make a list of things that you might find interesting - pick out a few and we'll be your eyes and ears, recording as we go and making comments on what we see. If you're lucky, you might even get the opportunity to pick some out for us...although I can already foresee some evil people making us eat buckets of chicken feet. And yes, they do sell them at almost every corner. --

Refuture Collaborator - You'll gain special inside access to the team's work on Refuture with the opportunity to collaborate and give direct feedback. You will also be listed as a special contributor on the Refuture App credits and website. A great one for those who want to be involved and have a hands-on experience.--

You will also be listed as a special contributor on the Refuture App credits and website. As a bonus, the Refuture team will prepare a home-cooked dinner and meet you for a meal (location to be discussed). We're great cooks. :)--

story:
A Little About Pour

Hi, my name is Ryan, and simply put: I love wine.  I moved to the great city of Charleston  a decade ago, and at that time I was introduced to wine by someone very close to me.  Since then, wine has evolved from a social hobby into a serious passion.  Over the last few years, I have been working on turning my passion into my profession.

Our goal is to bring a wine bar and shop to the West Ashley area of Charleston. Currently we are proposing to the build the bar in a space that's part of the Carriage Lane Shops. We want to educate our customers about different styles of wine, and hopefully even take them out of their comfort zone in order to broaden their taste buds.  By offering wines by the glass that may not be found elsewhere around the city, we invite you to try new wines that you might not typically try based on price.  Buying wines can be intimidating, and most people tend to fall back on what they already know and like.  Pour will offer almost all the wine we sell by the glass so you can take comfort in knowing you like a wine before you commit to a bottle.  So sit down with us, enjoy a glass, and take a bottle home with you.  I look forward to serving you at Pour for years to come.

LET US TAKE THE GUESSING OUT OF TRYING AND BUYING WINE!


The Impact

We are looking for start-up capital to help with everything from;

  • Building out the bar: wine refrigerator, custom shelving, glassware
  • Creating a welcoming and comfortable space
  • Bringing in both high end and affordable top-rated wines from around the globe


Your contributions will not only help us bring a unique and locally-owned business to the area, but you can also take comfort in the fact that you helped build a place we hope you will love and enjoy for years to come.   


As with any new business, there will be challenges and hurdles to navigate and overcome. We ask for your patience while we work out the kinks - just know that we are doing our best to create a place that you'll want to return to time and time again.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people just can't contribute to the funding effort, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help get the word out about Pour and let people know about our fundraising campaign through your Facebook page!

story:
Spark's Unique Approach

We believe that our current international aid system is broken. Spark is turning international development on its head, from top-down and prescriptive to bottom-up and community-led. While many organizations ask global experts to design solutions to poverty, Spark works with rural communities in East Africa to identify their greatest challenges, and directly invests the resources to solve them. 

We believe that community ownership is an essential component of a successful development program.  Through a refined process of community organizing and small granting, Spark equips the poorest communities in the world with the tools and resources to tackle their greatest social and economic challenges. 

Spark trains and equips local university graduates to be Community Facilitators through a comprehensive training program. Facilitators work with infrastructure-poor villages in a structured five-month planning process. The community identifies a commonly shared social challenge and designs a project to overcome that challenge. Community members design the project implementation strategy and budget, and democratically elect a leadership team. Spark then provides each community with the funds to achieve their goals. 

What We Need & What You Get

We plan to double our reach in 2015. Spark's typical community investments are not huge: Partner communities request no more than $10,000 to achieve their commonly defined goals -- but the impact of these funds is enormous. Not only does Spark democratize funding for the poorest communities in the world, but the model builds community cohesion, empowers female leaders, and sets communities up for long-lasting development success. 

Your funding will go directly to the field: to take 10 more communities facing rural poverty in east Africa through the Spark process in 2015. 

The Impact

Since 2010, Spark has worked with nearly 100 distinct communities and 64,000 people in Rwanda, Uganda, and Burundi to design solutions to their most urgent social and economic challenges. 

Spark partner communities have built health facilities and primary schools, launched income generating projects such as goat farms and bee keeping operations, and implemented female vocational training programs. By integrating a performance-based metrics and a rigorous monitoring framework into each project, we have found that 95% of community projects are sustainable over a three year period. 

Risks & Challenges

Spark's budget has doubled every year since its conception, which we believe is a testament to our track record and an indication of the promise of community-led development. We will continue to prioritize rigorous analysis of our impact as we grow.   

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to donate your own funds this year, please help us spread the word. Share the Spark model and this campaign through Indiegogo, Facebook, Twitter, and word of mouth. And if you find yourself in East Africa, please come visit a community project.

story:
What is LAFI Burkina?

LAFI Burkina(Lasting Action For Inclusion in Burkina Faso) is a UK charity that was setup in January 2014 by a small group of individuals who have all had experience of working alongside people with disabilities in Burkina Faso.

What does LAFI Burkina do?

Having witnessed the difficulties faced by people with disabilities in Burkina Faso, we setup LAFI Burkina to find ways to support organisations working for the inclusion of people with disabilities in Burkinabe society.

How much money do we need to raise?

Over the past year, LAFI Burkina has been fundraising to raise enough money to become a UK registered charity, in order to be able to access more funding and better support our partner organisations in Burkina Faso. We have been able to raise £1,000 so far, and are hoping to raise £2,000 through this campaign.

Where will the money go?

As a volunteer-led organisation, ALL the money we raise will go towards supporting projects that work with people with disabilities in Burkina Faso. This includes projects such as:

  • Espace Bambino: an educational centre and playgroup for children with disabilities
  • Sport: training in a variety of sports for people with disabilities
  • Tigoung Nonma: a cooperative of disabled artisans who work together to secure economic independence
  • Drop-in Centre: an advice centre for anyone with a disability-related issue
  • Welding workshop: a workshop that produces mobility aids, as well as providing skills training and employment opportunities for people with disabilities
  • Advocacy work: to promote and protect the rights of people with disabilities

You can learn more about these projects on our website. 

Subscribe: stay up to date with LAFI Burkina through our mailing list. Please sign up here.


Please support LAFI Burkina to raise money to better support disabled people's organisations in Burkina Faso.

story: My son inspired me to want to start my own nonprofit to spread awareness on autism. I am the mother of an incredible child Steven who is autistic. He is a bright boy almost turning 5 in a few days. As I go to places in my neighborhood I notice that some people stare at us when my son stims or has a "mini meltdown" or just acts "different". These situations made me realize the lack of autism awareness in the area, I would like to bring awareness to people so they can be more educated on everything autism. I would also like to organize events in which parents feel comfortable to bring their kids so they can have a good time and where parents get together to talk with other parents or caretakers, this can be therapeutic and informative. Please spread the word, let's make this happen!

story:
THE NEXT GENERATION OF INTELLIGENT, HIGH-OUTPUT LED LIGHTING HAS ARRIVED!  CROSSROADS LED, a woman-owned and completely self-funded company, has focused our expertise and experience in LED technology to develop a complete family of multicolor and white LED products that are 18-24 months ahead of the technology available today.  Our proprietary approach to LEDs has led to technical advances that have not only created the brightest, but also the most reliable and efficient LED products on the market today, placing CROSSROADS LED as an innovator in the industry.  CROSSROADS LED is now seeking funding and contributions to establish an American-based production facility that will compete against the cheap and poorly manufactured LED lighting products currently offered today.  Our intent is to not only produce and market our line of UL-tested products but also to bring much needed jobs and opportunities to the U.S.

What We are Seeking

CROSSROADS LED is seeking $250,000 in funding that will provide the seed money for a production facility and equipment as well as the hiring of technicians to begin production.  Additional dollars will be used in marketing, additional personnel and component inventory in order to reduce lead time issues often faced with newly emerging technologies.

The Issues

Since the beginning, CROSSROADS LED has set out to “do business differently.”  That has been illustrated in a number of areas.  First, the lighting and technology industries have often been a “cut throat” game of cost-cutting and “bait-and-switch.”  We committed ourselves to making sure that our customers and our vendors could take us at our word.  Integrity and quality would always be our foundations and our focus.  Second, we realized that in order to keep that focus, we would need to self-fund our company.  We were approached early on about partnering with other entities, but only if we were willing to compromise our standards or outsource our manufacturing overseas.  We knew we could never do that.  And third, we committed to remembering that while we want to be a profitable business, we want to make sure that our designs and our practices help our conviction in green technologies and higher efficiencies.

Overcoming the Challenges

As stated in our video, our company is at a “crossroads.”  In order to stand out in the industry and compete on a level playing field with industry giants who rely on cheap, overseas manufacturing and an antiquated, multi-tiered distribution model, CROSSROADS LED must “step up its game” and provide products on the large scale.  One of the difficulties of new tech companies today is when they “over-promise and under-deliver.”  Simply put, they either offer unproven technologies or accept more orders than they could possibly deliver.  Our challenge is to make sure that as we prepare to step out into the larger market with our high quality LED lighting products, we need to establish a solid manufacturing capacity ready to back up our promise of multiple orders delivered in a timely and efficient manner without sacrificing quality or reliability.

There are always risks in being a “David” in a “Goliath” industry like LED lighting.  These include intellectual property trespass/theft, unscrupulous business practices and changing the mindset that equates quality with a recognized brand image.

We face these challenges by being as prudent as possible with patent/trademark protections, a focused marketing strategy that balances product data with an education on becoming a knowledgeable LED consumer and a commitment to provide independent UL-certified test data in lieu of the “internally generated” (and not always accurate or reliable) in-house test data that is often provided by larger corporations.  Additionally, we have made the corporate decision that no matter how we approach a potential client or business deal, we will NEVER sacrifice our integrity or our ethics.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone has the resources to financially contribute to our campaign.  But wait!  There’s still a place for you in our journey!

Our mission is to provide high-quality LED products that reduce both global CO2 emissions and the crippling energy demand on our aging infrastructure and to do so with integrity right here in America.  And if you believe in our mission as we do, then tell a friend about our journey and our desire to not just talk about the problems in energy consumption and in the corporate focus of profit over people but our commitment to actually doing something about it!  Send an email!  Share our link on Facebook!  Tell a co-worker!  And, we would love to hear from you!  Let us know your thoughts and your hopes for young tech businesses in America!

Thank you again for taking the time to hear our story and to consider making a contribution.


Our Perks 

CROSSROADS LED is proud of its technology, from the decorative lighting to industrial applications.  That is why we are excited to offer these perks:

$1.00 Contribution:  Our most sincerest thanks!


$25.00 Contribution:  “Crossroads LED” lanyard. 

Our royal blue lanyard with white lettering lets everyone know of your support for our project!  Expected delivery date:  January 2015.


$50.00 Contribution:  “Crossroads LED” ball cap.

This adjustable white ball cap with our blue logo helps spread the word, whether on the golf course or at the game, that you’re backing a company that is seeking to change the planet -- one light at a time!  Expected delivery date:  January 2015.


$165.00 Contribution:  Personalized, multicolor LED glowing trophy.

   

These unique and one-of-a-kind trophies and awards have to be seen to be believed.  Transparent acrylic blocks are precision-cut and laser-etched with your customized logo or name and mounted to a black base housing a high-output multicolor LED and battery holder.

Each trophy will flash and fade through a variety of colors, illuminating the etched portions of the acrylic.  Each trophy is 5.5” X 8.5” with a ½” black acrylic base.  Personalization includes 4 lines of text:  Line one will be a larger font with a maximum of 20 characters.  Lines 2-4 will be a smaller font with a maximum of 30 characters.  Logos welcome.  Contact Buddy at buddy@crossroadsled.com for download information.  Expected delivery date:  February 2015.


$200.00 Contribution:  High-output LED under-cabinet light.

This simple and easy-to-install white LED under-cabinet light is nearly twice as bright as other lighting and has an adjustable “low/high” intensity setting.  This one-foot, water-tight LED tube has a 140° beam angle which will light a 3-foot area of cabinet without a problem!  It also includes two quick-clip fasteners for easy installation.  Expected delivery date:  February 2015.


$225.00 Contribution:  CROSSROADS FAN KIT!

Put your support for our campaign into high gear by combining our multi-color LED trophy, a CROSSROADS LED ball cap and a CROSSROADS LED lanyard!  A great bargain! 


$475 Contribution:  One-foot “INFINITY Series” LED tube light. 

This premium series LED lighting system utilizes our proprietary control system and incorporates a novel power supply and controller with 4, 3-watt integrated red, green and blue LEDs, all on a one foot board.  This system includes the water-tight LED tube, a USB cable, a CD and a power supply.  The CD has our Windows-based software application that allows you to control the color, the intensity and the lighting effects all at the touch of a mouse.  Once the color and effects are chosen, the choice is saved and the USB connection can be removed, allowing the system to run in a “stand alone mode” until you reconnect and make another choice.  Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.


$525 Contribution:  3-foot “Professional Series” LED tube light.

This high-intensity, multicolor LED light has two red, two green and two blue, 1-watt industrial LEDs per foot that provides a light output that is two to three times brighter than any comparable product on the market today.  The system includes the 3-foot tube, a simple “One Button” controller that will allow you to turn the system on and off and cycle through a variety of colors and effects and a power supply.

This system can be plugged into any regular outlet and can be used for direct or indirect lighting in a variety of applications … from room/ceiling illumination to alcove/loft lighting.  Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.


$720 Contribution:  5-foot “Professional Series” LED tube light.

This is the same system as the 3-foot option and is designed for larger lighting needs.  Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.


$995 Contribution:  4-foot “INFINITY Series” LED tube light. 

This is the 4-foot version of our INFINITY system and can be used to illuminate larger areas.  This system includes the water-tight LED tube, a USB cable, a CD and a power supply.  The CD contains a Windows-based software application that allows you to control the color and intensity as well as the lighting effects, all at the touch of a mouse.  Once the color and effects are chosen, they are saved and the USB connection can be removed so that the system can run in “stand alone mode” until you reconnect and make another choice.  Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.


$1200 Contribution:  5-foot “INFINITY Series” LED tube light.

This is the 5-foot version of the system listed above.  Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.


$1400 Contribution:  5-foot “INFINITY” LED tube light with DJ VU meter effect.

This 5-foot version of the “INFINITY Series” system includes all of the color changing options with the addition of the exciting DJ VU METER EFFECT option.  As seen in the introduction portion of the video, this additional effect connects utilizing an 3.5mm stereo audio jack.  The LED tube will “dance” to the rhythm of the music creating a vertical lighting display.  Great for clubs, mobile DJ systems and home entertainment.  Giant VU meter video:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R5OxbMB3W8w 

Estimated delivery date:  February 2015.

story:
Hey friends! We're Josh Enobakhare and Jordan Enobakhare.

Recently, our superstar friend Sade just posted that her car quit for good. Now we know Sade's the kind of person to stay positive and hope for a blessing, but wouldn't be awesome if we made that miracle happen?

Let's raise $2000 dollars and get her another car!

Hey friends! We're Josh Enobakhare and Jordan Enobakhare.Recently, our superstar 
friend Sade just posted that her car quit for good. Now we know Sade's 
the kind of person to stay positive and hope for a blessing, but 
wouldn't be awesome if we made that miracle happen?Let's raise $2000 dollars and get her another car!

story:
COMUCAP is an extraordinary women’s collective, more than 200 members strong, whose work is changing the lives of women in rural Honduras. 

Producing and selling coffee, aloe and other products, this remarkable group of women are transforming their communities and building a ladder for their families out of poverty. In addition to empowering women economically, COMUCAP also provides assistance to women survivors of violence.

A string of attempts by a former employee to wrest control from the economic collective of the commodities, land, production means, and markets that are so vital to the women of COMUCAP has weakened this vital organization.

COMUCAP needs our help… and they need it now. Without our assistance, this vital group may no longer be able to continue its important work for the women of Honduras.

Please donate whatever you can right now to help COMUCAP get through this difficult time and continue their work to empower women whose plights have too often been ignored.

Note: Our goal is $5,000. Funds will go to Women Thrive Worldwide, who will disperse funds to COMUCAP to keep them operating and helping rural women in Honduras.

ABOUT COMUCAP

Headquartered in Marcala, Honduras, COMUCAP…

  • Grows and sells coffee and aloe;
  • Makes and sells wine;
  • Provides help for women experiencing violence;
  • Organizes women to demand laws against violence and discrimination; and 
  • Empowers women with new ways to provide for their families

These remarkable women work together to serve more than 200 women in four municipalities in Honduras, forging pathways out of poverty and addressing violence against women.

YOUR DONATION

Your contribution will help COMUCAP…

  • Secure the legal rights of COMUCAP’s members to the land, commodities, and production means for the coffee, aloe, and other products the collective markets and sells.
  • Replace stolen computers and other tools necessary to continue to expand their work to empower women.
  • Train women in how to market the products they grow.
  • Advocate for reforms to ensure that the voices of rural Honduran women are heard.
  • Continue operations at COMUCAP’s Marcala headquarters, which is a hub for women’s empowerment and assistance.

About Women Thrive Worldwide

Women Thrive is a U.S.-based 501(c)(3) advocacy organization dedicated to lifting up the voices of women in developing countries to help women and girls address poverty, violence, hunger, access to education and the effectiveness of international aid.

story:
A Little About Sugar Roots Farm

Sugar Roots Farm was born out of the realization that many of the kids in this city will never have the opportunity to understand where their food comes from, or to understand the difference between real ingredients and fresh food versus food that is transported from far away or food that is heavily processed or artificially flavored or colored or preserved with chemicals or kept whole through the use of pesticides.

My name is Sharessa Garland, and I am the founder of Sugar Roots Farm.  My career has been in farming, animal husbandry and birdkeeping.   My hobbies have included gardening and composting.

I have a dream.  My dream is that my children and your children will grow up with opportunities to see, touch, smell, taste and understand the beauty of farming, the work of the farmer, how market demands have impacted food production, and how food can be produced with a smaller carbon footprint.

This is huge, folks.  Giving city kids an opportunity to experience a farm right here in our parish, means that our kids can learn the importance of understanding what makes food healthy and how to choose healthy foods.  Even more, our aim is also to help our community's children learn compassion and respect for each other and our earth through exposure to this traditional, sustainable, farming model!

What We Need & What You Get

Start-up costs are very high for farmers. This is just a fourth of the cost we need for the down payment on the land, but it sure will help if we can reach this goal of $25,000, or go over it. Here's what we're asking for:

 We have several viable options the New Orleans Metro area and we are turning to you, our community, to help us by contributing toward the down payment on the land. 
  • For every person that contributes $25, we will send you a plastic feed cup with our logo, (which doubles as a drinking cup for you) and a free admission.
  • For every person that contributes $125 or more, we will send you a cup and an oh-so-stylish Sugar Roots Farm t-shirt and two free admissions!
  • For every person that contributes $1000 or more, will receive two cups, two shirts, two free admissions AND you choose the name of one of our farm animals. 
  • For a corporate sponsorship of $2500, your logo will appear on the back of the Sugar Roots Farm shirt for it's first full year in operation!!!!! And you will also get four free admissions, four T-Shirts, and four farm to-go cups!
  • Any funds raised will be used toward the down payment, even if we do not reach our goal.

Any funds that are raised in excess of the limit will be used toward payment on the land.

The Impact

 Your contribution will support our mission:

  • The mission of Sugar Roots Farm is to foster compassion and physical wellness in metro New Orleans communities through farm-to-fork education, and to make a positive impact on the environment using a sustainable, free-range working farm model.

 

Your donation will help us:

put a down payment on the land where we will provide hands-on, interactive educational farm tours, connection and interaction with farm animals, grammar-school group day tours and summer camps, internships, externships, classes on composting, and low maintenance  landscaping with native plants. 
Additionally, the farm will serve as an environment for group retreats,
events and an annual fall festival, 

Risks & Challenges

 We have a strong business plan and are working to develop strong community allies such as schools and other farming ventures.  We are different in our scope in that our model will include livestock, an apiary, and a barn with indoor classroom space. Personal financial risks and the challenges associated with them, are the greatest Sugar Roots Farm faces at this point. However the benefits far outweigh the risks in realizing this dream.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, and we know many people cannot, you can still help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Sugar Roots Farm and what we are trying to do.
  • All you need to do is use the Indiegogo share tools!

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Sugar Roots Farm and what we are trying to do. All you need to do is use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Where We Are

After 11 years of renting, the Integral Yoga Center of Pennsylvania has purchased our beautiful building in New Berlin. This is a giant step forward for IYCPA. Please consider making a donation of any amount so we may continue thriving and expanding our work.


What We Need & What You Receive

The Center has set a goal to raise $5,000 during this year's Sun Salutation Fundraiser.  Donations can be made at any level, and optional thank you gifts include:

  • Limited-edition Deep Relaxation CD featuring Sudharman

  • Double Tickets to this June's IYCPA benefit at the Campus Theatre

  • One Month of Unlimited Classes

  • Deluxe Jade Yoga Mat

The Impact

Your contribution will directly help the Yoga Center provide affordable, community-minded programming.  In addition to being used to enhance and further our holistic programming at the Center, it will also be used to:

  • Provide free classes to Yoga for Cancer patients, survivors, and caregivers.
  • Cover heating costs and other utilities. Each year we pay approximately $5,500 for propane.
  • Pay the salary of our Operations Manager. 
  • Cover mortgage payments, insurance, property taxes, supplies, equipment costs.
  • Advertise and cover printing fees.
  • Contribute to the tuition of advanced teacher trainings.


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute money? IYCPA loves its volunteers! You can help in these ways:

  • Get the word out!  Make some noise about this campaign. Share on Facebook, Twitter, and via email. Do this directly by using the Indiegogo share tools.

  • We will need a variety of individuals to help us distribute gifts to donors. Please contact us via email or telephone if you are willing to contribute your time.


This year's participants include...


  

Vani, our Center's own Integral Yoga Hatha II instructor, has set a personal goal of flowing through 108 sun salutations during a special yoga session being held during our Summer Solstice Celebration weekend. Support her and our other sun salutation fundraiser participants Jane Mulrooney and Fran Smith by clicking "Contribute Now" and making a donation of any amount to help IYCPA reach our goal of raising $5,000.

story:
Short Summary

Hello

  • My name is Brooklyn
  • I am a high school student
  • I fell in love with debating 2 years ago
  • I have been invited to the National Debating Seminar
  • My family sadly cannot afford the trip

Please be generous, I love what I do but if you don't donate I will not be able to further pursue my dreams. 

What We Need & What You Get

Your contributions will help us with various costs associated with a week long trip such as:

  • Room and board.
  • Gas.
  • Meals.
  • You will be giving me the opportunity of a lifetime so please help as much as you can.

The Impact

If You would allow me to attend this seminar:

  • I would gain knowledge on public speaking and debate which will help me throughout my life.
  • At the C.N.D.S. I would be immersed with successful debaters from around the country, teaching me about national unity.

  • I am a successful debater in my own wright and I'm sure, with your help, I could do very well.Your decision will effect me for the rest of my life 

Risks & Challenges

The National Debate Seminar only admits 2 junior debaters per province, per year and as far as I know a debater can only apply once. This is my only chance.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not all of you nice people can donate, but that doesn't mean you can't contribute.

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools.

Please be generouse, thank you.

story:
Eng:  "There is a new webpage in the city..Which is? Comoenitaly.com"

Ita: “ C’è una nuova pagina web in città...Quale? Comoenitaly.com”

Spa: "Hay una nueva web en ciudad..Cual? Comoenitaly.com"

 

Hi guys, we are three young engineers with a passion: Italy and Italian Food. When we studied together we had a dream: telling everyone about the real flavors and secrets of Italy. Now we are living between Madrid and London, and everyone we run into gets excited when we say, “We are Italian!.”

They want to know everything about our country:

  • Which is the best monument to visit in Rome?
  • Where was the real Pizza born and which is the best pizzeria in Naples?
  • Where can we drink the best Red Chianti wine in Tuscany?
  • Which is the best Italian restaurant in their city?

 

We are doing this campaign to expand our Video community Comoenitaly.com into other countries, translating these answers into many languages and making Comoenitaly.com enjoyed by all those addicted to Italy and Italian food!!

 

Our funding Goal:

We need a big fund to realize our dream, we’re talking about 100.000€. To create our network in the biggest Cities and Country of the World, we have to develop our commercial network and invest a lot of money in advertising.

Whoever you are (our fan, a nerd, a lovers of Italian pasta, an Italian abroad, or a Millionaire with an Italian ancestor..) and you have decided to help us, we are forever  grateful to you.  Additionally, we would like to say thank you by providing you with a unique perk: a tour in our bay, visiting Naples, Pompei, Capri and Ischia Island, Amalfi Coast where you can discover the real flavors of Italy with us.

N.B: If we reach our funding goal we will use this money to complete our platform and create a bigger network, moving to a second and third country.

 

Through your contribution we could :

  • Help owners of Italian restaurants to become known to our community
  • Advise  our followers where they can eat authentic Italian food: both abroad and in Italy
  • Help many little regional producers of Italy to export their typical products
  • ...tell us how we could bring these products to you.

If you feel we can help in any other way, feel free to contact us.

 

Thanks to Indiegogo

We know that Indiegogo is a big opportunity for everyone to help lay the seeds, but now we need you… tomorrow you'll do the same!!

 

 

ITALIANO

Perchè Comoenitaly.com:

Ciao ragazzi, siamo tre giovani ingegneri con una passione: l'Italia e il cibo italiano. Quando abbiamo studiato insieme avevamo un sogno: raccontare a tutti i veri sapori e i segreti dell’Italia. Ora viviamo tra Madrid e Londra, ogni persona che incontriamo qui e in ogni viaggio è entusiasta quando diciamo che siamo italiani!.

  • Vogliono sapere tutto ciò che riguarda il nostro paese:
  • Qual è il più bel monumento da visitare a Roma?
  • Dove è nata la vera pizza e quale è la migliore pizzeria di Napoli?
  • Dove possiamo bere il miglior vino rosso Chianti in Toscana?
  • Qual’è il miglior ristorante italiano nella loro città all’estero?

 

Stiamo facendo questa campagna per espandere la nostra video community: Comoenitaly.com in tanti  altri paesi, traducendo queste risposte in molte lingue e facendo si che Comoenitaly.com sia fruibile da tutti gli amanti dell’Italia e del Made in Italy.

Il nostro obiettivo:

Abbiamo bisogno di un fondo abbastanza grande per realizzare il nostro sogno, stiamo parlando di 100.000 €. Dobbiamo allargare il nostro network nelle più grandi città del mondo, investendo in forti campagne di comunicazione.

Chiunque tu sia (un nostro fan, un nerd, un amante della pasta italiana, un italiano all'estero, un milionario con antenati italiani, un italiano “vero” ..) e stai decidendo di aiutarci,  ti saremo grati innanzitutto e potrai usufruire di alcuni  nostri riconoscimenti: un tour nel golfo campano, una visita a Napoli, Pompei, Capri, Ischia, la Costiera Amalfitana per scoprire iniseme i veri sapori dell’Italia.

NB: Con quello che riusciremo a recuperare da questa campagna completeremo la nostra piattaforma e creeremo un network più grande in altri 2 o 3 paesi.

Con il vostro contributo possiamo:

Aiutare i ristoratori italiani a farsi conoscere

  • Dare consigli ai nostri followers su  dove mangiare italiano sia in Italia che all'estero
  • Aiutare i  molti piccoli produttori regionali italiani ad esportare i loro prodotti tipici
  • ... consigliaci anche tu cosa potremmo fare

Se volete darci un aiuto diverso, non esitate a contattarci per spiegarci come potreste aiutarci e quale valore aggiunto potreste avere per Comoenitaly.com

Grazie a IndieGoGo

Sappiamo che IndieGoGo è una grande opportunità per realizzare idee utili. Ora abbiamo bisogno di te .. domani forse sarai tu ad aver bisogno di noi!

 

ESPANOL

Porque Comoenitaly.com:

Hola chicos, somos tres jóvenes ingenieros con una pasión: Italia y la comida italiana. Cuando estudiamos juntos teníamos un sueño: comunicar a todos los sabores auténticos y el secreto de Italia. Ahora estamos viviendo entre Madrid y Londres, cada persona que encontramos aquí y durante nuestros viajes está encantada de saber que somos italianos!

Ellos quieren saber todo acerca de nuestro país:

  • ¿Cuál es el mejor monumento para visitar en Roma?
  • ¿Dónde nació la pizza y cuál es la mejor pizzería de Nápoles?
  • ¿Dónde podemos beber el mejor vino de Chianti en Toscana?
  • ¿Cuál es el mejor restaurante italiano de la ciudad en el extranjero?

Estamos haciendo esta campaña para expandir nuestra vídeo comunidad de Comoenitaly.com, y escribir estas respuestas en muchos idiomas, para que todos los adictos a Italia puedan disfrutar de ella!

Nuestro objetivo:

Necesitamos una gran inversión para hacer realidad nuestro sueño, alrededor de 100.000 €, para crear nuestra red comercial e invertir mucho dinero en publicidad.

Tanto si eres un amante de Italia como si eres un millonario que quieres invertir en nuestro proyecto y quieres ayudarnos, estaremos muy agradecidos. En cambio te ofrecemos un viaje a Italia, una visita a  Nápoles, Pompeya, Capri y la isla de Ischia, Costa de Amalfi, para poder descubrir los sabores auténticos de Italia con nosotros.

P.D.= El dinero recaudado se invertirá para completar nuestra plataforma y crear una red más grande, en otros 2 o 3 países.

A través de tu contribución se podría:

  • Ayudar al dueño del restaurante italiano que forma parte de nuestra comunidad
  • Asesorar a nuestros seguidores para aconsejarles sobre dónde comer comida italiana de verdad en el extranjero y en Italia
  • Ayudar a muchos pequeños productores regionales de Italia para exportar sus productos típicos

Si también quieres contribuir dandónos una ayuda diferente, no dudes en contactar con nosotros para explicarnos cómo podrías ayudarnos y qué valor añadido puedes ofrecernos.

Gracias a IndieGoGo

Sabemos que IndieGoGo es una gran oportunidad para todo el mundo. Ahora te necesitamos .. mañana quizás nos necesites tú!
